MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に戻ってきて、またテーブルを前に会議を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: Having returned to my room, the two of us had another discussion at the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having returned to my room, the two of us had another discussion at the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…どうでもいいですけど、ちゃんとした家具はありませんの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Not that I care, but have you no decent furniture here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Not that I care, but have you no decent furniture here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、このテーブル？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, are you talking about this table?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, are you talking about this table?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これはテーブルじゃありませんわ。ただのダンボールです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This is not a table. It is just a cardboard box.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This is not a table. It is just a cardboard box.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…でもずっとこれでやってきたからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-Hmm... But we've been using it for quite some time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-Hmm... But we've been using it for quite some time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ま、いいですけど…」
`理樹@「かいつまんで話すと、えーと…」
`理樹@「まず、ここからいなくなった人なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Firstly, regarding those who're no longer in here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Firstly, regarding those who're no longer in here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「え、ええ…」
`理樹@「事情を知ったから、ここから退場になった、ってことみたいなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They were forced out because they learned about your situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They were forced out because they learned about your situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんも、そうだったでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember? That happened with Komari-san as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember? That happened with Komari-san as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「で、神北さんはどうなりましたの？」
`理樹@「多分、どうにもなってないよ。ここからいなくなっただけみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing, I guess. It just seems that she is no longer in this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing, I guess. It just seems that she is no longer in this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですの…」
笹瀬川さんがひとつ息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a long sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a long sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 安心半分、寂しさ半分と言った感じだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It must contain an equal measure of relief and loneliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must contain an equal measure of relief and loneliness.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかんだで、小毬さんがいるときは嬉しそうだったからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's no surprise... Sasasegawa-san looked so happy when she was with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's no surprise... Sasasegawa-san looked so happy when she was with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、もうひとつなんだけど」
`理樹@「…外じゃ、大きな騒ぎは何も起こってない」
`佐々美@「何も？」
`理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「ここから脱出できれば、それで元通りってこと、かも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that means if we make it out of here, everything will return to the way it was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that means if we make it out of here, everything will return to the way it was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、その方法は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And there are two ways out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And there are two ways out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「穴を見つけて抜け出すことと、この世界の意味を、全うすること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Finding a hole which leads out, or fulfilling this world's purpose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Finding a hole which leads out, or fulfilling this world's purpose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「意味を？　よくわかりませんわね」
`理樹@「うん、それは前に言ったのと同じだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's what I told you before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's what I told you before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここを作った意味があるはずだから、作った人の望みを叶えること、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone created this world because they have a wish. So, to put it another way, fulfilling their wish should get us out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone created this world because they have a wish. So, to put it another way, fulfilling their wish should get us out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ま、それならその穴というのを見つけるほうが手っ取り早いですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, in that case, the first option ought to be faster to accomplish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, in that case, the first option ought to be faster to accomplish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなるけど…」
`佐々美@「でも、そんな穴なんて見つかりませんでしたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Although, I saw no such holes anywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Although, I saw no such holes anywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「物理的な穴じゃないよ。比喩表現としての穴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not a physical one. I was just using it as a metaphor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not a physical one. I was just using it as a metaphor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わ、わかってますわよっ」
`佐々美@「で、そこなんですけど…よろしいかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So, I have discovered something regarding that... May I speak now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So, I have discovered something regarding that... May I speak now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。こっちは大体終わったから、笹瀬川さん話してよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, sure. I'm finished. What have you got, Sasasegawa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, sure. I'm finished. What have you got, Sasasegawa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ」
`佐々美@「…ここ、外に出られませんわよ」
`佐々美@「校門が塞がってましたわ。焼却炉と同じみたいに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The school gate is sealed just like the area around the incinerator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The school gate is sealed just like the area around the incinerator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校門が？」
`佐々美@「…ついでに言いますと、裏門も柵を越えようとしても、ですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Furthermore, the rear gate is inaccessible as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Furthermore, the rear gate is inaccessible as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、学校の外には出られないってことかな…」
でも、それは校内に捜索範囲が限定されたってことになる。
MESSAGE.EN: However, that also makes the school the only area we have to search.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, that also makes the school the only area we have to search.

MESSAGE.JP: …もし、この世界のマスターが、僕らの出られない外にいるって言うなら、完全にお手上げだし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Still, there's absolutely nothing we can do if the master happens to be outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Still, there's absolutely nothing we can do if the master happens to be outside.

MESSAGE.JP: もっとも…。
`理樹@（外に僕と面識があって、こんなことをしようとする人なんていないと思うけど…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I doubt anyone I know from outside the school would do something like this...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I doubt anyone I know from outside the school would do something like this...)

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと考える。
…面識って意味じゃ、笹瀬川さんも同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In terms of acquaintances, the same went for Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In terms of acquaintances, the same went for Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 少なくとも、笹瀬川さんと僕、ふたりと面識がなきゃいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I mean, it should be someone we've both met.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean, it should be someone we've both met.

MESSAGE.JP: となると、元々学校に絞られるんじゃないかって話だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: And if that's the case, they must be within the school grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: And if that's the case, they must be within the school grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと気付く。
昨日、僕が犯人じゃないかって思ったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Yesterday I had suspected I myself might be the culprit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yesterday I had suspected I myself might be the culprit.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（笹瀬川さんだったとしたら？）
考えられない話、ってわけじゃない。
そもそも、僕が犯人ってのも無い線じゃないと思うんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: But me being the cause is still quite possible, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: But me being the cause is still quite possible, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さっきから黙って何を考えてますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You have been silent for a while. Care to share your thoughts?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You have been silent for a while. Care to share your thoughts?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　い、いや…」
面と向かってそんなこと言ったら、絶対また怒られる…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I were to have told her that, she would've definitely gotten mad again...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I were to have told her that, she would've definitely gotten mad again...

MESSAGE.JP: それに、まだ憶測の段階だし、適当なこと言っても混乱させるだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And on the top of that, it was nothing more than speculation; it would've probably just increased her confusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: And on the top of that, it was nothing more than speculation; it would've probably just increased her confusion.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、何か気付きました？」
`理樹@「いや…うーん…」
考え込んでいると。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was in deep thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was in deep thought...

MESSAGE.JP: ドアからのノックの音で、考えを中断される。
MESSAGE.EN: A knock on the door shattered my concentration.
MESSAGE.Translation: A knock on the door shattered my concentration.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だ、誰か来ましたわっ」
`理樹@「あちゃ、誰だろ」
`佐々美@「また猫になってしまいますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'm going to turn back into a cat again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'm going to turn back into a cat again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、仕方ないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, we can't just ignore the visitor, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, we can't just ignore the visitor, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうこうしてると、もう一度ドアがノックされる。
MESSAGE.EN: The visitor knocked on the door again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The visitor knocked on the door again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、誰？」
`謙吾@「理樹、俺だ」
`理樹@「あ、謙吾…」
`佐々美@「み、宮沢様っ!?」
`謙吾@「入るぞ」
`佐々美@「ちょ、ちょっとっ、隠れますわっ」
ばっ、とベッドの中に潜り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She quickly dove into the bed and under the covers.
MESSAGE.Translation: She quickly dove into the bed and under the covers.

MESSAGE.JP: と同時に、布団のふくらみが小さくなる。猫化したんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon after that, the bulge in the sheets vanished; she must have turned into the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon after that, the bulge in the sheets vanished; she must have turned into the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなに見られたくないのかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how badly did she want to hide her cat self from him?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how badly did she want to hide her cat self from him?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「誰かいたのか？」
`理樹@「あー、いや…猫が」
`謙吾@「なるほど、猫か。確かに見付かると厄介だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see. That cat. It'd certainly be a problem if someone were to see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see. That cat. It'd certainly be a problem if someone were to see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
なんとかごまかせたようだ。
`理樹@「で、どうしたの？」
`謙吾@「理樹」
`理樹@「うん」
`謙吾@「何か、おかしくないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't you feel something's out of place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't you feel something's out of place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、な、なにかって？」
`謙吾@「わからない…」
`謙吾@「わからないが、なにかおかしい気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can't, but I have that feeling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can't, but I have that feeling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …謙吾はまだ気付いてはいないみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It doesn't seem like he's realized anything yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It doesn't seem like he's realized anything yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
話すのは簡単だ。謙吾だって喜んで協力してくれるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be easy to confess the truth to him right now; I'm certain he'd be happy to help us.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be easy to confess the truth to him right now; I'm certain he'd be happy to help us.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、そうすると、謙吾はすぐに退場することになってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: But if I did that, he'd soon be ejected from this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if I did that, he'd soon be ejected from this world.

MESSAGE.JP: …本当に協力が必要なときまで、謙吾には黙っておくのがいい気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...So I think it'd be better to keep it a secret from him until we truly need his support...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...So I think it'd be better to keep it a secret from him until we truly need his support...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにかって、何もないと思うよ…」
`謙吾@「そうか…？」
釈然としない表情で考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: An unsatisfied expression overtook his face as he started to ponder.
MESSAGE.Translation: An unsatisfied expression overtook his face as he started to ponder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、きっと謙吾の考えすぎだよ」
`謙吾@「理樹、何か隠しているな」
`理樹@「えっ!?」
`謙吾@「長い付き合いだ。何か変な挙動があれば、俺にだってわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We've known each other for quite some time. Long enough that I can tell when you're acting strangely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We've known each other for quite some time. Long enough that I can tell when you're acting strangely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…話せないのか？」
`理樹@「う、うん…」
だって、話すと謙吾はここからいなくなっちゃうんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I did, he'd have to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I did, he'd have to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なるほど。じゃあ仕方ないな」
`謙吾@「いつか話してもらえるのか、それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Can I assume you'll tell me some day?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Can I assume you'll tell me some day?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん…」
`謙吾@「そうか。安心したぞ」
ああ、やっぱり今すぐ話して協力して欲しい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, how I wish I could tell him right away and get him to help us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, how I wish I could tell him right away and get him to help us.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、我慢する。
MESSAGE.EN: But I must force myself not to.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I must force myself not to.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…」
`謙吾@「ふう…そんなに深刻なことなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Phew... so it's something that serious, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Phew... so it's something that serious, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「話すことが出来るようになったら、いつでも言ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let me know when you decide it's time to tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let me know when you decide it's time to tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺はいつだっておまえの味方だ」
言い終えると、立ち上がる。
`理樹@「謙吾…」
ドアを出ていく背中に、声をかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke to him just as he was going through the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke to him just as he was going through the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、なんだ」
`理樹@「ごめん、本当にありがとう」
`謙吾@「…ああ」
謙吾は去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…行ってしまいましたわね」
`理樹@「うん…」
`ふたり@「はぁ…」
同時に大きくため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us released heavy sighs in unison.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us released heavy sighs in unison.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
…元に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and she turned back into a human.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and she turned back into a human.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「も、もーっっ!!　窮屈すぎますわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That does it!! It's too cramped in here!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That does it!! It's too cramped in here!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんなところ、さっさと出て行きたいですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I want to get out of here already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I want to get out of here already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ホントだよ…」
友達に隠し事なんて、あんまり気分のいいものじゃない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hiding something from your friend never feels good.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hiding something from your friend never feels good.

MESSAGE.JP: しかも、話したいのに話せないなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: What makes it worse is I can't tell him even though I really want to.
MESSAGE.Translation: What makes it worse is I can't tell him even though I really want to.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は、あんなに親身になって話してくれたのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: He even offered me a sympathetic ear...
MESSAGE.Translation: He even offered me a sympathetic ear...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だって、こんなことなら今すぐにでも逃げ出したい。
MESSAGE.EN: I too want to get out of this place right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I too want to get out of this place right away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でも」
恭介が最後に残してくれた言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the last words that Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the last words that Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: あの時は、よく聞こえなかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't completely catch his words back then, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't completely catch his words back then, but...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@『おまえが願いを叶えてやるって事を、願ってる…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@[I hope you can make their wish come true...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@[I hope you can make their wish come true...]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@『その、儚い世界を作り出した、誰かの…!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@[The wish of whoever created that fragile world...!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@[The wish of whoever created that fragile world...!!]

MESSAGE.JP: そう、僕には聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like that was what he'd said to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like that was what he'd said to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱりさ…」
`佐々美@「…なんですの？」
`理樹@「やっぱりさ、出来るなら、逃げるって方じゃない選択肢を選びたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's possible, I want to take the hard way out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's possible, I want to take the hard way out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は…？」
`理樹@「もちろん、出口は探すよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course, we'll look for a way out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course, we'll look for a way out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「けど、この世界の意味も、出来る限り探してみたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I also want to find out as much about why this world was created as I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I also want to find out as much about why this world was created as I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…それは…」
一瞬、考えて。
`佐々美@「あなたがしたいようにすればいいですわ」
そう答えてくれた。
`理樹@「協力してくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you be willing to support me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you be willing to support me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「していただいてるのはこっちですわ。あなたがそうするなら、わたくしもそうします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are the one supporting me. If you wish to do this, I will do it too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are the one supporting me. If you wish to do this, I will do it too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
夜になる。
`佐々美@「ふんふんふ～ん♪」
料理をする笹瀬川さんは相変わらず楽しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like earlier, she looked like she really enjoyed cooking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like earlier, she looked like she really enjoyed cooking.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに材料は僕が学食のおばちゃんに頼んで、分けて貰ってきたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As for the ingredients, by the way, I'd asked a cafeteria lady for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: As for the ingredients, by the way, I'd asked a cafeteria lady for them.

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらずあのエプロンなんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: And she was wearing that apron again...
MESSAGE.Translation: And she was wearing that apron again...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、本当は猫好きなんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, aren't you actually really fond of cats...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, aren't you actually really fond of cats...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何か言いまして？」
`理樹@「あ、いや、なんでもない」
`佐々美@「嫌いですわよ…」
`理樹@「…なんで？」
`佐々美@「ご飯よそってくださる？」
`理樹@「あ、うん」
笹瀬川さんと差し向かいで、夕食を摂る。
MESSAGE.EN: We started dining, face to face.
MESSAGE.Translation: We started dining, face to face.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…昔の話ですわ」
`佐々美@「昔、わたくしは一匹、猫を飼ってましたの」
`佐々美@「黒猫ですわ」
笹瀬川さんはゆっくりとした口調で続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She continued, articulating each sentence slowly and carefully.
MESSAGE.Translation: She continued, articulating each sentence slowly and carefully.

MESSAGE.JP: その子と出会ったのは、まだ生まれたばかりの子猫で、歯も生え揃ってないころ。
MESSAGE.EN: I came across him when he was still a toothless, newborn kitten.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came across him when he was still a toothless, newborn kitten.

MESSAGE.JP: 公園の片隅で、枯葉に埋もれるようにその子は捨てられていましたわ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was abandoned, left in a pile of dead leaves in corner of the park.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was abandoned, left in a pile of dead leaves in corner of the park.

MESSAGE.JP: わたくしは学校の帰りでした。
MESSAGE.EN: I found him on my way home from school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found him on my way home from school.

MESSAGE.JP: そのときは、母猫が迎えにくるだろうと思って、そのまま家へ帰りました。
MESSAGE.EN: At first, I paid little attention and went home as I thought his mother would soon return to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first, I paid little attention and went home as I thought his mother would soon return to him.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、夜になって、その子が気になって…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I became worried later that evening...
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I became worried later that evening...

MESSAGE.JP: わたくしは、公園へ向かいました。
MESSAGE.EN: And headed back out to the park.
MESSAGE.Translation: And headed back out to the park.

MESSAGE.JP: その子は、その場を動きもせず、ただ震えていました。
MESSAGE.EN: He was still in the same spot, weak and shivering from cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was still in the same spot, weak and shivering from cold.

MESSAGE.JP: わたくしは、そのとき初めて知りました。
MESSAGE.EN: It was then that I realized...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was then that I realized...

MESSAGE.JP: …この子は、一人ぼっちで捨てられたんだ、と。
わたくしは、母親代わりになって、その子を家で育てることにしましたわ。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to be a surrogate mother and took him home to look after him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to be a surrogate mother and took him home to look after him.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、両親が簡単に許してくれるとは思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I knew my parents wouldn't agree easily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I knew my parents wouldn't agree easily.

MESSAGE.JP: それまでも、ペットを飼うという話が無かったわけではありませんでしたから。
MESSAGE.EN: They had opposed having a pet several times before the black kitten.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had opposed having a pet several times before the black kitten.

MESSAGE.JP: ですから、部屋でこっそりと飼うことに決めたのです。
MESSAGE.EN: For this reason, I decided to secretly feed him in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: For this reason, I decided to secretly feed him in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、すぐに見付かってしまいましたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, that didn't last very long.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, that didn't last very long.

MESSAGE.JP: わたくしは必死に説得をして、ようやくその子をうちで飼ってもいい、と承諾を得ましたの。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately tried to convince my parents, and eventually they gave me permission.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately tried to convince my parents, and eventually they gave me permission.

MESSAGE.JP: それからは、色々大変でしたわ。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, I had to go through many rough times.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, I had to go through many rough times.

MESSAGE.JP: 夜中にみゃーみゃー鳴き出して起こされたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Sometimes he woke me up by starting to cry in the middle of the night.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sometimes he woke me up by starting to cry in the middle of the night.

MESSAGE.JP: いなくなったと思って、散々探し回った挙句、ベッドの隙間からひょっこり出てきたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Sometimes he went missing, only to pop up from under my bed after I had looked everywhere for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sometimes he went missing, only to pop up from under my bed after I had looked everywhere for him.

MESSAGE.JP: 服の上におしっこされたりとかもありましたわね…。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, he once peed on my clothes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, he once peed on my clothes...

MESSAGE.JP: けど、だんだんと大きくなっていって。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, he grew bigger little by little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, he grew bigger little by little.

MESSAGE.JP: 甘噛みされても、痛いくらいになってきて。
MESSAGE.EN: Even his gentle nibbling was starting to hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even his gentle nibbling was starting to hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: 離乳食を食べるようになって。
MESSAGE.EN: He started to eat baby food.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started to eat baby food.

MESSAGE.JP: 他にもどんどん食べられるようになって。
MESSAGE.EN: And after that, all kinds of food.
MESSAGE.Translation: And after that, all kinds of food.

MESSAGE.JP: 頼りなくて転びそうだった座り方もしっかりしてきて。
MESSAGE.EN: He started to become steady on his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started to become steady on his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな一つ一つが、嬉しかったのを覚えています。
MESSAGE.EN: Each and every change made me happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each and every change made me happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 知っています？　生まれて間もない仔猫は、瞳の色が青いんですのよ。
MESSAGE.EN: Did you know a newborn kitten has blue eyes?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did you know a newborn kitten has blue eyes?

MESSAGE.JP: その綺麗な色が変わってしまったのだけは、ちょっと残念でした。
MESSAGE.EN: Only the fact that the beautiful color of his eyes changed saddened me slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only the fact that the beautiful color of his eyes changed saddened me slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: それと、いろんなところに隠れる癖は、直りませんでしたわ。
MESSAGE.EN: And he never grew out of his habit of hiding.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he never grew out of his habit of hiding.

MESSAGE.JP: 何度叱っても、しばらくするとまた、いなくなってしまって。
MESSAGE.EN: However many times I scolded him for it, he wouldn't stop going missing.
MESSAGE.Translation: However many times I scolded him for it, he wouldn't stop going missing.

MESSAGE.JP: そのたびにわたくしは、家中を探し回りましたの。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time he did it, I looked all over my house for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time he did it, I looked all over my house for him.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風に、一年ほど過ぎて。
わたくしたち家族は、引越しをすることになりました。
老朽化した家は取り壊すことになり、みんな、別の街へ移り住むことになったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: The house was so old that we decided it was time to have it torn down and live in a different city.
MESSAGE.Translation: The house was so old that we decided it was time to have it torn down and live in a different city.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、その猫も一緒に行くはずでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, we were going to take the cat with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, we were going to take the cat with us.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、引越しの当日。
MESSAGE.EN: However, on the day we moved,
MESSAGE.Translation: However, on the day we moved,

MESSAGE.JP: 猫の姿はどこにも見当たりませんでした。
わたくしたちは、探し回りました。
家の中に隠れていたら、大変だと。
MESSAGE.EN: worrying that he might still be inside the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: worrying that he might still be inside the house.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、その姿はどこにもなくて…。
MESSAGE.EN: But he was nowhere to be found...
MESSAGE.Translation: But he was nowhere to be found...

MESSAGE.JP: その日は、そのまま引っ越していくしかありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: We had to give up and go to our new place that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had to give up and go to our new place that day.

MESSAGE.JP: 翌日、わたくしはすぐにその街へ戻りました。
MESSAGE.EN: The following day, I quickly headed back to the city.
MESSAGE.Translation: The following day, I quickly headed back to the city.

MESSAGE.JP: 取り壊されていく、古い家。
MESSAGE.EN: They were tearing down our old house.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were tearing down our old house.

MESSAGE.JP: その周りを、街中を探しました。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked for him around there and every other place in the city,
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked for him around there and every other place in the city,

MESSAGE.JP: もしかすると、どこかに隠れていたのかもしれないと。
MESSAGE.EN: hoping he must have been hiding somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: hoping he must have been hiding somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、どこにも猫の姿はありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I still couldn't find him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I still couldn't find him.

MESSAGE.JP: 張り紙もしました。
MESSAGE.EN: I even put up posters for a missing pet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I even put up posters for a missing pet.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、結局何の手がかりもありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I never received a single clue.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I never received a single clue.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、そのまま、今まで…二度と会うことは出来ませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: And ever since then... I never saw him again.
MESSAGE.Translation: And ever since then... I never saw him again.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「猫の寿命ってどれくらいかご存知？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Do you know how long a cat can live for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Do you know how long a cat can live for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　えーと…昔確か、近所に１０年くらい生きてる猫がいたような」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well... if I remember right, there was this pet cat which lived for like ten years in my neighborhood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well... if I remember right, there was this pet cat which lived for like ten years in my neighborhood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですわね。飼い猫は長生きしますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's right. Housecats can live even longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's right. Housecats can live even longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…聞いた話ですけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This is only something I have heard, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This is only something I have heard, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「飼い猫だった猫が野良猫になって、２週間生き延びる確率は、３分の１だそうですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Once housecats become strays, only one third are still alive after two weeks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Once housecats become strays, only one third are still alive after two weeks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんなに…？」
３分の１。
３匹猫がいたら、二週間生きているのは、たったの一匹。
MESSAGE.EN: If there were three cats, only of them would still be alive after two weeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: If there were three cats, only of them would still be alive after two weeks.

MESSAGE.JP: 低すぎる。
`佐々美@「きっと、どこかで死んでしまったんでしょうね…」
`佐々美@「置いていったわたくしを、きっと恨んでたでしょう」
`佐々美@「だ、だから、わたくしは猫が嫌いなのですわっ」
ごまかすように、ぱくぱくとご飯を口に運ぶ笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to gloss over her inner gloominess, she started eating her rice faster.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to gloss over her inner gloominess, she started eating her rice faster.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
笹瀬川さんは猫が嫌いなんじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not that Sasasegawa-san always hated cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not that Sasasegawa-san always hated cats.

MESSAGE.JP: …嫌いになるしか、なかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She had to make herself hate them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She had to make herself hate them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、ありがと」
`佐々美@「な、なんですの」
`理樹@「話してくれてさ」
`佐々美@「あなたが昨日、身の上話なんかするからですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I only did it because you told me about yourself yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I only did it because you told me about yourself yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふんっ、とそっぽを向いてから、流し台（洗面台に桶を置いたのだけど）へ食器を持っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: With a hmph, she turned around and carried our dishes to the sink (which was just a tiny plastic tub on the washstand).
MESSAGE.Translation: With a hmph, she turned around and carried our dishes to the sink (which was just a tiny plastic tub on the washstand).

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと…」
お礼…？
なんか違うような…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I don't think that's quite right...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I don't think that's quite right...

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食の片付けも終わって、ふたたび会議。
MESSAGE.EN: We continued discussing our situation after dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: We continued discussing our situation after dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「で、何か気付きましたの？」
`理樹@「うん…まだ、わからないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm still not quite sure, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm still not quite sure, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だいぶ絞られたと思うんだ。ここのマスター」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I have narrowed down the master of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I have narrowed down the master of this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らの共通の知り合いで、まだここに残ってる人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It has to be someone who's still around and whom both of us know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It has to be someone who's still around and whom both of us know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …その中には、僕と笹瀬川さんも含まれるわけだけど。
`佐々美@「し、知り合い…？　そんなの、数えるほどしかいませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝S-Someone we both know...? That limits the possibilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝S-Someone we both know...? That limits the possibilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。けど、誰かって特定しようがないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right. But we have no way of identifying them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right. But we have no way of identifying them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 疑おうとすれば、誰だって疑えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone could have been the culprit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone could have been the culprit.

MESSAGE.JP: 完全に絞りきるには、材料が足りなさ過ぎた。
MESSAGE.EN: We still didn't have any decisive information to help figure it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: We still didn't have any decisive information to help figure it out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らにできるのは、ここの調査だけかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess all we can do is keep looking around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess all we can do is keep looking around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…それは、仕方ありませんわね」
`理樹@「何かもっと手がかりがあればいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really hope we get more clues.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really hope we get more clues.❞

MESSAGE.JP: トリックがわかっても、犯人が特定できない。
MESSAGE.EN: Although we now know ❛howdunnit,❜ we still cannot figure out ❛whodunnit.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Although we now know ❛howdunnit,❜ we still cannot figure out ❛whodunnit.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 厄介な話だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: We were in quite a troubling situation...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were in quite a troubling situation...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「とにかく、出口だけは見つけないといけませんわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Either way, we must at least find a way out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Either way, we must at least find a way out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、そうなんだけど」
`佐々美@「じゃあ、探しに行きますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝In that case, we should get out there and search for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝In that case, we should get out there and search for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、今から？」
`佐々美@「空き時間がもったいないですわ」
`理樹@「そうだねぇ…じゃあ、探しに行こうか」
`佐々美@「ええ」
`理樹@「うーん」
…笹瀬川さんの言ったとおり、柵から外に出られない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As Sasasegawa-san had warned, I couldn't get out by going over the fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As Sasasegawa-san had warned, I couldn't get out by going over the fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫の笹瀬川さんを抱えて柵の向こうへやってみようとしたけど、それも押し戻されてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to climb over them with her in my arm, but was pushed back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to climb over them with her in my arm, but was pushed back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだろ…ＲＰＧの主人公って、こんな気分なのかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if this is how the protagonist in an RPG feels?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if this is how the protagonist in an RPG feels?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なんですの、それ？」
`理樹@「ゲームとかであるじゃない。川があったら橋を使わないと渡れない、みたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know, this is like trying to get over a river you can't pass over without a bridge in a RPG.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know, this is like trying to get over a river you can't pass over without a bridge in a RPG.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あいにくと、テレビゲームはよく知りませんの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Unfortunately, I know little about video games.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Unfortunately, I know little about video games.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ、そっか」
なんかこう、まどろっこしいと言うか、もどかしさがそんな感じなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I had simply wanted to convey the frustration of the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had simply wanted to convey the frustration of the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、このまま回ってみよう」
`佐々美@「あの、ところで…」
`理樹@「え、なに？」
`佐々美@「お、下ろしてもらえます？」
`理樹@「あ、ごめん…」
猫って抱えてると、温かくて気持ちいいんだよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding a cat warmed both my body and my soul...
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding a cat warmed both my body and my soul...

MESSAGE.JP: 学校を囲む柵を一周してみたけど、結局怪しいところは見つけられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite following the school fence all the way around the school, we were unable to find anything suspicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite following the school fence all the way around the school, we were unable to find anything suspicious.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そろそろ戻ろうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess we should head back now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess we should head back now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「仕方ありませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I suppose that is for the best now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I suppose that is for the best now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外に出るってイメージだったから、周りを探してみたわけだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: We had checked the periphery of the school in hopes of finding a way outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had checked the periphery of the school in hopes of finding a way outside.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうも、単純に考えすぎてたかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like it's not going to be so simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like it's not going to be so simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わ、悪かったですわね単純でっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Well excuse me for being so simple!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Well excuse me for being so simple!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いや、違うってば。笹瀬川さんのこと言ってたわけじゃないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, no, you misunderstood. I wasn't talking about you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, no, you misunderstood. I wasn't talking about you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「出口って言うのは、探せばあるってもんじゃないのかもしれないなぁって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What I meant was we probably won't be able to find an exit by looking for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What I meant was we probably won't be able to find an exit by looking for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どういうことですの？」
`理樹@「うーん、なんだろ。うまく言えないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, what can I say? I can't put it into words well, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, what can I say? I can't put it into words well, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気付かなきゃ気付けないような…それこそ、この世界がおかしいってことみたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You won't notice it until you notice it... Just like how we hadn't noticed the strangeness of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You won't notice it until you notice it... Just like how we hadn't noticed the strangeness of this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、そういう風に隠されてるものな気がしてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm starting to feel like the exit might be hidden in the same fashion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm starting to feel like the exit might be hidden in the same fashion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どっちにしても探して気付かなきゃいけないわけですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Either way, we must keep looking for it and notice it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Either way, we must keep looking for it and notice it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど。
`理樹@「…それもそうだね」
考えすぎてたかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I might have been overthinking it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I might have been overthinking it...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、わたくしはちょっと寄っていきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right then, I have somewhere I need to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right then, I have somewhere I need to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どこに？」
`佐々美@「シャワーですわよ」
`理樹@「あ、うん、わかった」
`佐々美@「では、失礼しますわ」
笹瀬川さんは廊下をとことこと歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked away down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked away down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: ところで、猫の姿でどうやってシャワーを浴びるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking of shower, how would a cat shower?
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking of shower, how would a cat shower?

MESSAGE.JP: …気になる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was tempted to go see for myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was tempted to go see for myself.

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、猫がお風呂場なんかに入ってるのが見つかったら、それこそ大騒ぎじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, if someone saw her feline form in the bathroom it would cause a lot of trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, if someone saw her feline form in the bathroom it would cause a lot of trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ちょっと、行ってみよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think I'll go take a look...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think I'll go take a look...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、覗きにいくわけじゃないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I had no intention of peeking...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I had no intention of peeking...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ」
清掃中の看板が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a floor sign saying the bathroom was closed for cleaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a floor sign saying the bathroom was closed for cleaning.

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど、とりあえずこれなら生徒が入ってくることはない。
MESSAGE.EN: Brilliant idea. This would keep people from going in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Brilliant idea. This would keep people from going in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、大丈夫かな…」
笹瀬川さんならうまくやるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure she would manage on her own.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure she would manage on her own.

MESSAGE.JP: 今まで、見つかってないわけだし…。
MESSAGE.EN: At least she hadn't been caught so far...
MESSAGE.Translation: At least she hadn't been caught so far...

MESSAGE.JP: とか思ってたら。
`声@「にゃぎゃぁーーーっ!!」
声が聞こえた。
`理樹@「うわっ、あれ笹瀬川さんだっ!!」
`生徒@「え、なに？　猫の声したけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Eh, what was that? I think I heard a cat cry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Eh, what was that? I think I heard a cat cry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「気のせいじゃね？」
…まずい、だいぶ響き渡ってる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is bad. Her scream carried pretty far.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is bad. Her scream carried pretty far.

MESSAGE.JP: 急いで助けにいかないと!!
MESSAGE.EN: I'd better hurry up and help her!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd better hurry up and help her!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんっ」
`佐々美@「た、助けてくださいませーっ」
`理樹@「うわっ、溺れてるっ!!　湯船になんか入ろうとするからだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh my god, you're drowning!! You should never have tried to take a bath!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh my god, you're drowning!! You should never have tried to take a bath!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …びしょびしょになったけど、何とか救出して部屋に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I got my clothes wet, I managed to rescue her and bring her back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I got my clothes wet, I managed to rescue her and bring her back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふう…大丈夫だった？」
`佐々美@「え、ええ…」
ぼん。
元に戻る。
`理樹@「え、どうし…」
`佐々美@「わたくしはお風呂もゆっくり入れないんですのっ!!」
`佐々美@「うわあぁぁあぁーんっ!!　もう嫌ですわぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uwaaaaaa!! Just put me out of my misery already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uwaaaaaa!! Just put me out of my misery already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ、な、泣かないでよっ!!」
`理樹@「え、えーと、ほら、笹瀬川さんはすごいじゃないっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-Well, you know what, you're really amazing!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-Well, you know what, you're really amazing!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…なにがですのっ!?」
`理樹@「え、えーと…」
…ソフトのことはもう言っちゃったしなぁ。
`理樹@「そうだ、鈴とまともにやりあえるのなんて、笹瀬川さんくらいじゃないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right! You're the only one strong enough to stand up to Rin!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right! You're the only one strong enough to stand up to Rin!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どうせ最近負け続きですわよーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Thank you very much for reminding me of how I always lose to her now!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Thank you very much for reminding me of how I always lose to her now!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しまった逆効果だ!!
MESSAGE.EN: That made her even more depressed!!
MESSAGE.Translation: That made her even more depressed!!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だいたい、入浴中のところを殿方にみられて…もうお嫁にいけませんわぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides, since you saw me in the bath... I can never become a bride now!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides, since you saw me in the bath... I can never become a bride now!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、でもそれは猫だったし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you were a cat at the time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you were a cat at the time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今服着てるじゃない!!　服着たまま入ってたようなもんなんだよきっと!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're wearing your clothes right now!! You could actually say you were taking a bath fully dressed!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're wearing your clothes right now!! You could actually say you were taking a bath fully dressed!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしがなんだか変な子ですわぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That makes me seem a total weirdo!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That makes me seem a total weirdo!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: まずいっ、よりネガティブになってしまったっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god, everything I said only added fuel to the fire.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god, everything I said only added fuel to the fire.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だ、大丈夫だってっ。どうせ知ってるの僕だけだし、僕が責任とるよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝D-Don't worry! I was the only one who saw, so I'll take responsibility!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝D-Don't worry! I was the only one who saw, so I'll take responsibility!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「責任って、どうとりますの…？」
`理樹@「えーと、そりゃあきっと…」
`理樹@「もちろん、誰にも言わないで胸にしまって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝ I'll keep it to myself and won't tell anyb...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝ I'll keep it to myself and won't tell anyb...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「しまう必要なんてないですわっ!!　とっとと忘れてくださいませ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Please do not!! Would you just forget it already!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Please do not!! Would you just forget it already!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…そりゃ、もちろん」
…でも、あんだけインパクトのあることを忘れろって言うのも難しい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But it's pretty hard to forget such an unusual event.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But it's pretty hard to forget such an unusual event.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ま、まあ、確かに知っているのはあなただけですものね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Well, you are right, you are the only one who knows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Well, you are right, you are the only one who knows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お婿に行きます」
`佐々美@「な、ぬなっ、なんですってっ!?」
`理樹@「ほら、だから大丈夫だよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I do that, everything will be fine!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I do that, everything will be fine!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ほ、ほらってっ、全然大丈夫じゃないですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-What!? Nothing is going to be fine!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-What!? Nothing is going to be fine!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だからさ、とりあえず落ち着いてよ」
`佐々美@「う、ううぅ…」
よかった、おさまったみたいだ。
`佐々美@「ふ、ふんっ…わたくしとしたことが、取り乱してしまいましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝H-Hmph... What a blunder, to lose my cool like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝H-Hmph... What a blunder, to lose my cool like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、頑張って出来る事やっていこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's keep doing what we can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's keep doing what we can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「元はと言えばあなたがっ…」
`佐々美@「はぁ…何なんですの、あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝*Sigh*... What in heaven's name are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝*Sigh*... What in heaven's name are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、何って言われると…」
何なんでしょう。
そして、夜も更けて。
`理樹@「じゃ、電気消すよ」
`佐々美@「ええ…」
今日の事を考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I started going over what I'd learned today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started going over what I'd learned today.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫。
笹瀬川さんが昔、飼っていたと言う、猫。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san used to have a black cat as a pet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san used to have a black cat as a pet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ひとつ、繋がる要素が見付かった気がする…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I guess I've found one thing that relates to this theory...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I guess I've found one thing that relates to this theory...)

MESSAGE.JP: それは、笹瀬川さんがこの世界のマスターだっていう仮説に繋がる要素だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The theory that Sasasegawa-san was the master of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: The theory that Sasasegawa-san was the master of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: この世界は想像が創造する世界。
MESSAGE.EN: This world was something created out of imagination.
MESSAGE.Translation: This world was something created out of imagination.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、マテリアルの無いものは、構築できない。
MESSAGE.EN: And nothing can be created without material.
MESSAGE.Translation: And nothing can be created without material.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、その要素を持ってる人になら。
MESSAGE.EN: Consequently, as long as someone has that material...
MESSAGE.Translation: Consequently, as long as someone has that material...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（作れるってことだ）
…笹瀬川さんと黒猫の間には何かしら関係があると考えていい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It seemed safe to assume that there was a connection between Sasasegawa-san and the black cat she used to take care of.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It seemed safe to assume that there was a connection between Sasasegawa-san and the black cat she used to take care of.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、おそらくそれを知ってるのは。
MESSAGE.EN: But those who know about it are probably...
MESSAGE.Translation: But those who know about it are probably...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕か、本人だけだ。
そして、僕はついさっき知ったばかり。
MESSAGE.EN: And I only just recently learned about what happened to her and the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I only just recently learned about what happened to her and the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: こう考えれば特定できたりもするんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at it from that perspective, you should be able to be determine who the cause was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at it from that perspective, you should be able to be determine who the cause was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（笹瀬川さんの話と、変身したときの猫がイコールで繋がらないからなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(The story of the cat she told me isn't connected to the cat she turns into...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(The story of the cat she told me isn't connected to the cat she turns into...)

MESSAGE.JP: あくまであの猫は、校内で笹瀬川さんに懐いていた猫であって。
MESSAGE.EN: What she turned into was the cat that was hanging around her at this school.
MESSAGE.Translation: What she turned into was the cat that was hanging around her at this school.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんの話していた黒猫は、多分もう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Most likely, the other black cat has already...
MESSAGE.Translation: Most likely, the other black cat has already...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（そうすると、ものすごく強引な仮説になるからなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(If that's the case, my theory will sound too forceful...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(If that's the case, my theory will sound too forceful...)

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずそのことは置いておこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I put all that aside for the time being...
MESSAGE.Translation: I put all that aside for the time being...

MESSAGE.JP: とすると、一番有力なのは。
MESSAGE.EN: As a result, the strongest hypothesis would be...
MESSAGE.Translation: As a result, the strongest hypothesis would be...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…笹瀬川さん、になるのかな…）
確証は無い。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no solid proof, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no solid proof, though.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、現状で一番有力な説なら、それをやってみるべきじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, since it was the most plausible theory available at the moment, why not try to verify it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, since it was the most plausible theory available at the moment, why not try to verify it?

MESSAGE.JP: この世界の意味。
それは、僕がこうしているってことは、僕にできることのはず。
MESSAGE.EN: It should be something I could fulfill, given that I still remained there.
MESSAGE.Translation: It should be something I could fulfill, given that I still remained there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ねえ、笹瀬川さん、起きてる？」
`佐々美@「起きてますわよ」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さんはさ、なんか願い事ってある？」
`佐々美@「なんですの、突然？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is with that question all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is with that question all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや、特に他意はないんだけど」
`佐々美@「そんなの、突然訊かれてもわかりませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It was so sudden that I cannot think of anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It was so sudden that I cannot think of anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、なんかあるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you have at least one, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you have at least one, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですわね…」
`佐々美@「こんな世界があるなら、ってことですわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Provided I am in a world like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Provided I am in a world like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
`佐々美@「…やっぱり、別にありませんわ」
`理樹@「ええぇ…」
`佐々美@「なんですのそれは」
`理樹@「い、いやー、別に」
`佐々美@「なにか、謎解きのヒントになるんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would it help us solve the puzzle of this world?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would it help us solve the puzzle of this world?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、そうなる、かも…」
`佐々美@「…だったら、こんな世界を作るような願い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, I suppose trying to figure out what kind of wish would make someone create a world like this would make sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, I suppose trying to figure out what kind of wish would make someone create a world like this would make sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふーん…難しいですわね…」
なんか、取っ掛かりは無いかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if there was anything to go off...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if there was anything to go off...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ、笹瀬川さん、謙吾のこと好きなんだよね？」
`佐々美@「は、はいっ!?　なんですのそれはっ!!」
`佐々美@「そ、それはその、その…」
`佐々美@「そ、そうですわね。こんな世界でも、宮沢様とふたりっきりでお話しができるなら、素敵ですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Y-Yes, even in this world, it would be most wonderful if the two of us could have a private conversation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Y-Yes, even in this world, it would be most wonderful if the two of us could have a private conversation...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
`佐々美@「じゃあ、あなたはどうですの？」
`理樹@「え、僕？」
`佐々美@「人にだけ訊いて、自分は言わないのは卑怯でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is unfair that you know my wish but I do not know yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is unfair that you know my wish but I do not know yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもそうだね…」
僕の願い。
みんなと、いっしょに、ずっといっしょに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Being together with everyone, together forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Being together with everyone, together forever...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと、考え直す。
もし、こんな世界なら。
在り得ないことでも、叶ってしまうようなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If even the impossible could be fulfilled in there...
MESSAGE.Translation: If even the impossible could be fulfilled in there...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お父さんとお母さんに、もう一度会ってみたいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I might want to see my parents one more time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I might want to see my parents one more time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、こんな世界でも、それは叶わないだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I knew that was something that couldn't come true, even in that world.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I knew that was something that couldn't come true, even in that world.

MESSAGE.JP: それに、会って何をするんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And even if I could see them, what would I do then?
MESSAGE.Translation: And even if I could see them, what would I do then?

MESSAGE.JP: 寂しかった日々、辛かった日々が取り戻せるわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not like it would make those tough, lonely days that I had gone through go away.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not like it would make those tough, lonely days that I had gone through go away.

MESSAGE.JP: …けど。
もし、だ。
何もなくても、会えるならって。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it changed nothing, I still wished I could see them one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it changed nothing, I still wished I could see them one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、『なくしもの』って、そういうものなんだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I figure that's what it means to ❛lose❜ something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I figure that's what it means to ❛lose❜ something.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですわね…」
`理樹@「あ、いや、寂しいとかそんなんじゃないんだけどね。みんなもいるしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, no, not that I feel lonely or anything. I have everybody with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, no, not that I feel lonely or anything. I have everybody with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ですからっ」
`佐々美@「わたくしには、そんな強い願いなんて何も無いですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have no strong wishes like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have no strong wishes like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばふ、と布団の音。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her turn over under her blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her turn over under her blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（うーん…）
強い願いじゃない、かあ。
MESSAGE.EN: She said she had no real wishes related to Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said she had no real wishes related to Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、さっきの謙吾のことってのは、マテリアルにならないかな？
MESSAGE.EN: But I still couldn't rule out her feelings for Kengo being the basis of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still couldn't rule out her feelings for Kengo being the basis of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: とすると、僕にできることは、笹瀬川さんと謙吾を…。
MESSAGE.EN: That meant all I could do about those two was...
MESSAGE.Translation: That meant all I could do about those two was...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そういうのってよくないとは思うけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I do know it's none of my business.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I do know it's none of my business.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（気が進まないなぁ…）
でも、やってみるしかないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I don't think I have a choice...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I don't think I have a choice...

MESSAGE.JP: とにかく、今日は寝よう…。
MESSAGE.EN: At that point, I called it a night...
MESSAGE.Translation: At that point, I called it a night...

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃ。
ドアが開いた音。
笹瀬川さんが外に出てったみたいだ。
眠い…。
けど僕もなんかトイレ行きたくなってきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I started feeling like going to the bathroom as well...
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I started feeling like going to the bathroom as well...

MESSAGE.JP: 寝ぼけ眼をこすりながら起き上がり、部屋を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Rubbing my sleepy eyes, I got out of bed and headed out to the bathroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rubbing my sleepy eyes, I got out of bed and headed out to the bathroom.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、もう一度寝よう…。
僕は僕のベッドに入り、そのまますぐ寝に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I started falling asleep as soon as I got back into my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started falling asleep as soon as I got back into my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: …直後、まどろみながらドアの開く音を聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I heard the door open again a short time later.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I heard the door open again a short time later.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ、なんかあったかいなぁ…。
まあ、いいか…。
『誰か』は嫌われ者だった。
どうしてだろう。
…なぜか、嫌われた。
仲間がいたときもそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the same even when they had company.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the same even when they had company.

MESSAGE.JP: …『誰か』の子供のころだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is when that ❛somebody❜ was still a kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is when that ❛somebody❜ was still a kid.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな自分を好いてくれる人がいた。
嫌う人から守ってくれさえした。
MESSAGE.EN: They even protected 'them' from those who hated ❛them❜.
MESSAGE.Translation: They even protected 'them' from those who hated ❛them❜.

MESSAGE.JP: その人について歩いた。
住みかでは、いつだって一緒にくっついて歩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the den, ❛they❜ always stayed right beside them.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the den, ❛they❜ always stayed right beside them.

MESSAGE.JP: 住みかの中でも嫌う人はいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in there, there were a few people who hated ❛them❜.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in there, there were a few people who hated ❛them❜.

MESSAGE.JP: …その人は、そんなことがあると、いつも怒っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The kind person always got angry about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The kind person always got angry about that.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな日の夜は、ベッドにもぐりこんで、一緒に眠ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time that happened, ❛they❜ snuck into that person's bed and they both slept there together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time that happened, ❛they❜ snuck into that person's bed and they both slept there together.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰が決めたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Who was it that decided this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was it that decided this?

MESSAGE.JP: …すごく、理不尽なこと。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Who decided to let all these unreasonable things happen to ❛them❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Who decided to let all these unreasonable things happen to ❛them❜?

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、そんなこと、誰が決めたんだろう…。
けれど、きっとそのころは、幸せだった。
大好きな人の後ろを、ついて歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They❜ were happy when ❛they❜ followed the person ❛they❜ loved.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They❜ were happy when ❛they❜ followed the person ❛they❜ loved.

MESSAGE.JP: それに、既視感を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I'd experienced this before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I'd experienced this before.

MESSAGE.JP: …ああ。
おかあさんだ。
ちいさいころ、ずっと見上げながらついて回った、おかあさんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was very little, I followed her wherever she went, looking up at her...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was very little, I followed her wherever she went, looking up at her...

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶は残ってなくても、感覚は残っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The memory of it had been lost, but the feeling still remained with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The memory of it had been lost, but the feeling still remained with me.

MESSAGE.JP: …おかあさん…。
目が覚める。
`理樹@「ふわぁ…」
いつになくいい目覚めだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a more pleasant awakening than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a more pleasant awakening than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: なんかシャンプーかリンスみたいな、いいにおいもする。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a nice smell, too. Something like shampoo or hair conditioner.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a nice smell, too. Something like shampoo or hair conditioner.

MESSAGE.JP: むに。
`理樹@「ん」
隣で寝ている笹瀬川さんに手が触れてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I seemed to be touching something on Sasasegawa-san, who was sleeping next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seemed to be touching something on Sasasegawa-san, who was sleeping next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ!?」
いやまてっ、なんで笹瀬川さんが隣で寝てるんだっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hold on, why in the world was she sleeping right next to me!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Hold on, why in the world was she sleeping right next to me!?

MESSAGE.JP: …そうだ、昨日寝ぼけていつもどおりに下のベッドで寝てたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, right, I just remembered getting into the lower bed last night in my drowsiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, right, I just remembered getting into the lower bed last night in my drowsiness.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんも猫だったから、違和感なくそのままベッドに入れてしまったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san, being a cat at the time, must have not noticed anything wrong, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san, being a cat at the time, must have not noticed anything wrong, either.

MESSAGE.JP: しかし…。
これはまずい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was in an unquestionably bad situation...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was in an unquestionably bad situation...

MESSAGE.JP: さっきどこ触っただろう？
MESSAGE.EN: And just where did I touch her earlier?
MESSAGE.Translation: And just where did I touch her earlier?

MESSAGE.JP: 柔らかかった。
けど、感触は薄かったから…二の腕とかだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: But it had felt thin... so perhaps her upper arm?
MESSAGE.Translation: But it had felt thin... so perhaps her upper arm?

MESSAGE.JP: 位置を考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I considered the position I was in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I considered the position I was in.

MESSAGE.JP: どう考えてもおっぱいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And I realized it had been her breast.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I realized it had been her breast.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（やばいやばいやばいやばい…!!）
やばい、思ったより薄い…？
MESSAGE.EN: Well, they're way smaller than I thought...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, they're way smaller than I thought...?

MESSAGE.JP: どちらかというと、がっかりおっぱいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Really, I should call them sad, nay, verily disappointing boobs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Really, I should call them sad, nay, verily disappointing boobs.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そんなことはどうでもいい。とにかくやばい。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that wasn't important at the moment - I was in deadly peril.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that wasn't important at the moment - I was in deadly peril.

MESSAGE.JP: 幸い、笹瀬川さんはまだ目が覚めてない。脱出しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Luckily Sasasegawa-san was still asleep. I had to escape immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: Luckily Sasasegawa-san was still asleep. I had to escape immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、自分が今いる位置はベッドの奥側だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was between her and the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was between her and the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 慎重に移動しないといけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I needed to do it without disturbing her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I needed to do it without disturbing her.

MESSAGE.JP: …ベッドの横の柵から出てみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to try going over the bed rail...
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to try going over the bed rail...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「むっ…」
もぞもぞ…。
布団をもぐるようにして移動する。
いけそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I can make it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I can make it...

MESSAGE.JP: むに。
寝返りを打ってきた…!!
ほほに太ももを押し付けられる形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: Now she was pressing her thigh against my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now she was pressing her thigh against my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぐむむっ…」
スカートだから、直接だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: We were direct contact because she was wearing a skirt...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were direct contact because she was wearing a skirt...

MESSAGE.JP: 柔らかあったかい。
いやいやっ、やばいんだってばっ。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have any time to waste. I had to get out of there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have any time to waste. I had to get out of there.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく、足は柵まで届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, my feet finally reached the rail.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, my feet finally reached the rail.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっ…」
足を伸ばして、そこから腹筋で体を起こそうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched my legs and raised myself with my abs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched my legs and raised myself with my abs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うっ」
…起き上がりきれず、そのまま倒れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I only managed to make it halfway up and fell back down.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I only managed to make it halfway up and fell back down.

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、その下には…。
MESSAGE.EN: And of course, that woke her up...
MESSAGE.Translation: And of course, that woke her up...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、おはよう」
`佐々美@「な…」
`佐々美@「
な・
に・
し・
て・
くれてますのーっ!?」
`理樹@「うわあっ、ごめんごめんっ!!」
長い説得の末、ようやく話を聞いてくれた…。
MESSAGE.EN: It took a long time to convince her to give me an opportunity to explain...
MESSAGE.Translation: It took a long time to convince her to give me an opportunity to explain...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まあ、わたくしにもそのままベッドに入ってしまった、という責任はありますけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, I am also responsible since I did not check when I returned to bed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, I am also responsible since I did not check when I returned to bed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…でもごめんってば…」
`佐々美@「そこまで謝らなくてもいいですわよ…」
`佐々美@「…わ、わたくしにも非があったわけですから、そこはおあいこですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A-As I said, that was partly my fault, so we are even, okay...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A-As I said, that was partly my fault, so we are even, okay...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、でも…」
`佐々美@「…でも、どさくさにまぎれて変なところ触ってませんでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝By the way, you did not touch anything you should not touch, did you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝By the way, you did not touch anything you should not touch, did you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 触りました。
いや、もちろんわざとじゃないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course it hadn't been on purpose...
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course it hadn't been on purpose...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、意外と薄いがっかりおっぱい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I kind of touched your disappointingly tiny bre...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I kind of touched your disappointingly tiny bre...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は？」
`理樹@「な、なんでもない…」
失言だった。
`佐々美@「ま、まあ…これからはお互い気をつけるということでいいですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Well... let us agree to be more careful from now on, and leave it at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Well... let us agree to be more careful from now on, and leave it at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…だったら、やっぱり今度から笹瀬川さんが真人のベッドで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-Sure... To be on the safe side, maybe you should use Masato's bed next time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-Sure... To be on the safe side, maybe you should use Masato's bed next time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そっちのほうがよっぽど嫌ですわっ!!」
笹瀬川さんの中の嫌度は、『真人のベッド＞僕と添い寝』らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently she found sharing a bunk with me a better alternative to using Masato's bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently she found sharing a bunk with me a better alternative to using Masato's bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がそんなに嫌なのか、僕がそんなに嫌じゃないのかは、怖くて訊けなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked so frightening that I couldn't ask if it was because she disliked him that much, or because she didn't dislike me that much.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked so frightening that I couldn't ask if it was because she disliked him that much, or because she didn't dislike me that much.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室で一人、考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I was on my own in the classroom, thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was on my own in the classroom, thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: …昨日の謙吾と、笹瀬川さんのこと。
とにかく、まずはふたりをどうにかしないといけない。
MESSAGE.EN: First of all, I must do something for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: First of all, I must do something for them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
とは言ったものの、どうすればいいんだろう。
誰かに相談してみるのも手だけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Asking someone for advice could be useful...
MESSAGE.Translation: Asking someone for advice could be useful...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（今残ってるの、クドと葉留佳さん、それに謙吾か）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(We've still got Kud, Haruka-san, and Kengo left.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(We've still got Kud, Haruka-san, and Kengo left.)

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、謙吾は当事者だし除外だけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Naturally, Kengo wasn't an option, so...
MESSAGE.Translation: Naturally, Kengo wasn't an option, so...

MESSAGE.JP: クドに相談してみよう。
クドもこういう話は苦手そうだけど、たぶん葉留佳さんよりはマシだと思う…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I doubted she was very good with that sort of thing, she should be more useful than Haruka-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I doubted she was very good with that sort of thing, she should be more useful than Haruka-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、ちょっといい？」
`クド@「はい？　なんでしょうか」
`理樹@「うん、ちょっと相談があるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I need your advice on something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I need your advice on something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「相談、ですか？」
`クド@「はいっ、私でお力になれるならなんでも言ってくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sure, if there's anything I can help with, please don't hesitate to ask!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sure, if there's anything I can help with, please don't hesitate to ask!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
`クド@「いえいえー。困ったときはお互い様なのです。ゆーとぅーみーとぅーなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No problem. People should help each other in times of trouble. It's yu- tu- mi- tu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No problem. People should help each other in times of trouble. It's yu- tu- mi- tu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「実は、恋愛相談なんだけど」
`クド@「はい？」
`理樹@「うん、恋愛相談」
`クド@「れ、れんあーいですかっ」
`クド@「そ、それはその…あまりにご無体な…」
`理樹@「く、クド？」
`クド@「あ、いえ、続けてください」
`理樹@「いや、実は、ある女の子がある男の子のことが好きなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there's this girl who has a crush on this boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there's this girl who has a crush on this boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その女の子はずっとまともに話も出来ないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And she feels too embarrassed to bring herself to talk to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And she feels too embarrassed to bring herself to talk to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「女の子、ですか？」
`理樹@「うん」
`クド@「おー、あいしーあいしー」
`クド@「そうでしたかー」
`クド@「はっ、で、でも、私なんかで力になれるんでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh! B-But I wonder if I can really be of any help...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh! B-But I wonder if I can really be of any help...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女の子のことは女の子に訊くのが一番と思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I figure a girl would be the best advisor for another girl's problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I figure a girl would be the best advisor for another girl's problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「う、うーん…」
`クド@「あ、そうですっ」
`理樹@「なんかある？」
`クド@「お話しが出来ないなら…」
`理樹@「うん」
`クド@「まずはお話しをすればよろしいかと思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think she should start with talking to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think she should start with talking to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそれが出来ないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm asking for advice because she can't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm asking for advice because she can't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、待てよ。
つまり、そういう状況を作ってしまえばいいわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, putting the two in a situation where they have no choice but to speak to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, putting the two in a situation where they have no choice but to speak to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど。それもそうだね」
`クド@「あ、いえー、自分で言ってすごく自信がないのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, actually, I'm not too confident in that advice of mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, actually, I'm not too confident in that advice of mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「クドリャフカのえくすぺりめんとぽいんとは、いつまでたっても次のれべるに上がらないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kudryavka's ekusperimento pointo won't go up to the next reberu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kudryavka's ekusperimento pointo won't go up to the next reberu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫大丈夫。すごく助かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's perfectly all right. Thanks so much for the advice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's perfectly all right. Thanks so much for the advice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい。それなら良かったですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-That's good. I'm glad I could help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-That's good. I'm glad I could help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、それと、私からもひとついいでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, could I ask you something, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, could I ask you something, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
`クド@「なんだか、最近何かがおかしいような気がするのですがー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've been having this feeling that something isn't quite right lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've been having this feeling that something isn't quite right lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや」
出来れば、クドにももうちょっと残っていて欲しい。
MESSAGE.EN: I hoped Kud would remain with me for a little while longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hoped Kud would remain with me for a little while longer.

MESSAGE.JP: …誰もいなくなったら、寂しいし。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be so lonely if everybody left, leaving only me...
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be so lonely if everybody left, leaving only me...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分、何にもないよ。大丈夫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anything wrong. You worry too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anything wrong. You worry too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうでしょうかー」
`クド@「リキが言うなら、きっと何もないんでしょうねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If you say so, it must be nothing, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If you say so, it must be nothing, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
葉留佳さんに相談してみよう。
いや、こういうのもなんだけど、なんだか頼りないふたりが残ってしまった気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I hated to put it like this... but why were the two least reliable ones left...?
MESSAGE.Translation: I hated to put it like this... but why were the two least reliable ones left...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、ちょっといい？」
`葉留佳@「へ？　なーに、理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Heh? What are you up to, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Heh? What are you up to, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとした相談があるんだけど」
`葉留佳@「そーだん？　そりゃーはるちんはいつでも相談天国ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Advice? Of course! Haruchin's advice heaven is always open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Advice? Of course! Haruchin's advice heaven is always open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやーもー、理樹くんは仕方ないねー。なんでもこのはるちんに話してみて!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You really are hopeless, Riki-kun. Just lay your worries on Haruchin!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You really are hopeless, Riki-kun. Just lay your worries on Haruchin!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
非常に不安だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt more than a little anxious.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt more than a little anxious.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「と言うわけで、ある女の子と男の子との間を取り持とう、って言う話なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, to sum it up, I want you to figure out a nice way of getting the girl together with the boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, to sum it up, I want you to figure out a nice way of getting the girl together with the boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なるほどっ。わたしに任せてっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I see. You can totally count on me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I see. You can totally count on me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「バッチリドッキリぴったりさっくり解決してあげよう!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll give you a perfect, surprising, fitting, crispy solution!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll give you a perfect, surprising, fitting, crispy solution!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや…」
この場合、葉留佳さんが何か行動を起こそうとするなら、その時点で止めるべきである。
MESSAGE.EN: If she's going to do something herself, I'll have to stop her before things get out of hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she's going to do something herself, I'll have to stop her before things get out of hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よーし、こっちですヨ」
考える間もなく葉留佳さんに手を捕まれて、どこかに連れて行かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She took my hand and started dragging me somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took my hand and started dragging me somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけでおねーちゃん、後ヨロシク」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I leave the rest to you, Onee-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I leave the rest to you, Onee-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「は？」
…彼女はいつだって他人任せだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...So she left it to someone else like normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...So she left it to someone else like normal.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、変な騒動に発展するよりはいいんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, on second thought, it's way better than her making trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, on second thought, it's way better than her making trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「自分で何とかしなさい」
`葉留佳@「つめたーっ!?」
`佳奈多@「大体、なんで私なの」
`葉留佳@「えー？　だってそういうの苦手なんだもんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeehhh? Because I'm no good at handling that kind of stuff!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeehhh? Because I'm no good at handling that kind of stuff!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「あなたが引き受けたことでしょう？　だったら最後まで責任持ちなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Aren't you the one who took on the task? You have to see your actions through to the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Aren't you the one who took on the task? You have to see your actions through to the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううぅ…その通りです」
`葉留佳@「だが可愛い妹のためにおねーちゃんが助力することを私は要求する!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝However, Onee-chan, I demand you support your adorable little sister!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝However, Onee-chan, I demand you support your adorable little sister!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「可愛い妹？」
`葉留佳@「む、なんだーその『可愛い妹とか自分で言っちゃってすごくウザいけど妹だから仕方なく相手にしてやるしかないかぁ…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh, what's with that face that says ❛Geez, she's so annoying, calling herself adorable. Still, I think I have to bear with her since she's my sister.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh, what's with that face that says ❛Geez, she's so annoying, calling herself adorable. Still, I think I have to bear with her since she's my sister.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `はる＆かな@「『そんなことより戸棚のアップルパイはまだ大丈夫かしら？　プリント片付いたらお茶をいれてあーちゃん先輩とでも一緒に食べましょう』と言う顔は（ね）っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `HaruKanata@❝❛More importantly, I wonder if the apple pie left in the cupboard is still okay? I think I'll have it with A-chan-senpai after I'm finished with this paperwork.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `HaruKanata@❝❛More importantly, I wonder if the apple pie left in the cupboard is still okay? I think I'll have it with A-chan-senpai after I'm finished with this paperwork.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長い。
`佳奈多@「さすが双子ね。寸分違わずぴったりだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝In perfect harmony, as expected of my twin sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝In perfect harmony, as expected of my twin sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「むきーっ!!　ウザいとかアップルパイとか言うなーっ!!　私も食べたいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mukii!! I'm not annoying, and forget the apple pie!! I wanna eat it too!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mukii!! I'm not annoying, and forget the apple pie!! I wanna eat it too!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長くなりそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a feeling that it was gonna take a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a feeling that it was gonna take a while...

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ああ、はい。まだかかるからお茶でも飲んでて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Oh, here. Have a cup of tea while we wrap this up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Oh, here. Have a cup of tea while we wrap this up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、お構いなく」
`葉留佳@「この憤りを隠しきれない妹拳を食らえーっ!!」
ぱし。
`佳奈多@「きかないけど？」
`葉留佳@「なにーっ!?　ならば更なる怒りのダブル妹拳を食らえーっ!!」
`理樹@「ふぅ…この紅茶美味しいなぁ…」
長くなりそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yep, this will take a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yep, this will take a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 争い終わって。
MESSAGE.EN: The fight finally came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fight finally came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでまあ、ある女の子と男の子との間を取り持とう、って言う話なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like you to figure out a nice way of getting this girl together with this boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like you to figure out a nice way of getting this girl together with this boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ふうん。また無粋な相談ね」
`理樹@「いや、必要に迫られたって言うか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I kinda need to make this happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I kinda need to make this happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううぅ、妹を虐める姉はよくないと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uuu, big sisters shouldn't bully their little sisters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uuu, big sisters shouldn't bully their little sisters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「うるさいわね」
ちなみに姉妹のじゃれ合いは姉の一方的有利で終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, the playful fight between the twins ended in the big sister's victory.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, the playful fight between the twins ended in the big sister's victory.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「で、無粋ね。そんなのは当事者間で話し合ってもらいたいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝As I said, it's tasteless. Something like that should be worked out between the two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝As I said, it's tasteless. Something like that should be worked out between the two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それがそうも行かなくてさ」
`佳奈多@「ふうん？」
`葉留佳@「あ、じゃー、こういうときはアレですよアレアレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Tell you what, there's a perfect solution.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Tell you what, there's a perfect solution.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
`葉留佳@「ラブレター!!」
`葉留佳@「思いをしたためて、下駄箱に入れておくの!!　漫画で読んだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Write down your feelings and put the letter in their shoe locker! I saw it in a manga!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Write down your feelings and put the letter in their shoe locker! I saw it in a manga!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「却下」
`葉留佳@「え、なんで？」
`佳奈多@「そういう消極的な手段の成功率は著しく低いのよ。勇気のない負け犬が取る手段だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝The more timid the approach you take, the lower the success rate. Such a method is something a cowardly loser would choose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝The more timid the approach you take, the lower the success rate. Such a method is something a cowardly loser would choose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「相手に考える隙を与えず、勢いで電撃的に了解を得るのが一番よ。その他のことは二の次ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Her best option is to confess her love in one fell swoop and make him agree to go out with with her without giving him a chance to think. Nothing else is worth consideration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Her best option is to confess her love in one fell swoop and make him agree to go out with with her without giving him a chance to think. Nothing else is worth consideration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「積極攻勢、これに尽きるわ」
`葉留佳@「う、うぅ…そうだったのか～…」
しかし、二木さんが言うとなんだか物騒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But what Futaki-san said didn't seem very safe.
MESSAGE.Translation: But what Futaki-san said didn't seem very safe.

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「というわけで、本人連れて行って問答無用で二人っきりになる状況を作りなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝That said, take the girl to the boy and force them into a situation where they have no other choice but to talk to each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝That said, take the girl to the boy and force them into a situation where they have no other choice but to talk to each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「後は本人次第ね。そこでうまく行かない様なら、そもそもうまく行かない確率が高いから、それがベスト」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝The rest depends on her. If she fails at that point, it's hardly likely that the two would've worked out in the first place. Therefore, that's the best method.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝The rest depends on her. If she fails at that point, it's hardly likely that the two would've worked out in the first place. Therefore, that's the best method.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
確率論ばっかりだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She really seemed to like talking about likelihoods and probabilities...
MESSAGE.Translation: She really seemed to like talking about likelihoods and probabilities...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんかおねーちゃんが言うと、恋愛が軍事作戦のように聞こえてきますネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Listening to you, it almost sounds like you're approaching a love affair like a military operation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Listening to you, it almost sounds like you're approaching a love affair like a military operation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「な、何よ？　何か文句あるの？」
`葉留佳@「大体よく考えたら、おねーちゃんだっ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come to think of it, you've never had a...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come to think of it, you've never had a...

MESSAGE.JP: てもがっ」
`佳奈多@「黙りなさい」
葉留佳さんの口にアップルパイを突っ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She stuffed the apple pie into Haruka-san's mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stuffed the apple pie into Haruka-san's mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もがー!!　もががっ!!
あ、
ほいひい」
とりあえず、作戦方針は決まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, now I have a direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, now I have a direction.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さて…」
問題は、どうやって『直接話をする』かだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The thing is, how could I get those two to talk directly with each other?
MESSAGE.Translation: The thing is, how could I get those two to talk directly with each other?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、発想を変えてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I think I should put it another way.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I think I should put it another way.

MESSAGE.JP: この仮説は、『笹瀬川さんが謙吾と話をしたがってるという願い』で成り立っているものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My theory was based on Sasasegawa-san's wish being that she wanted to talk with Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: My theory was based on Sasasegawa-san's wish being that she wanted to talk with Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: ということは。
`理樹@「それが出来ないっていうことは、ないはず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It should be possible to fulfill it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It should be possible to fulfill it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局のところ、現状では笹瀬川さんが逃げているだけなわけで。
MESSAGE.EN: Ultimately, she was just staying away from him due to embarrassment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ultimately, she was just staying away from him due to embarrassment.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ、謙吾と笹瀬川さんは直接話をしてない。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was why she never had the opportunity to have a conversation with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was why she never had the opportunity to have a conversation with him.
