MESSAGE.JP: つまり、あとは笹瀬川さんを説得するだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, all I should have to do is encourage her.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, all I should have to do is encourage her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（それが簡単なようで、一番難しいことかなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It may sound easy, but it was going to be really difficult...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It may sound easy, but it was going to be really difficult...)

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、やってみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyhow, I had to give it a shot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyhow, I had to give it a shot.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、本当にそんなのでいいんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: But was that really what I was supposed to do?
MESSAGE.Translation: But was that really what I was supposed to do?

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、今僕は個人的な感情でそれを否定しようとしてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like there was a part of me that was telling me it wasn't...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like there was a part of me that was telling me it wasn't...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
`佐々美@「なんですの？　改まって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it? You look very serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it? You look very serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「謙吾に協力してもらおうと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should ask Kengo for help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should ask Kengo for help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は…？」
`理樹@「たぶん、この世界の意味について、必要なことだと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it is a necessary step in figuring out the purpose of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it is a necessary step in figuring out the purpose of this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんなこと言われましてもっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝B-But even if that is the case...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝B-But even if that is the case...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そのっ…それは、でも…」
`理樹@「それで、出来れば笹瀬川さんのほうから話をして欲しいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I want you to be the one to ask him to support us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I want you to be the one to ask him to support us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんなの無理ですわっ」
`佐々美@「だいたい、この姿で話なんてできっこないですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝In the first place, how can I talk to anybody when I look like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝In the first place, how can I talk to anybody when I look like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
もちろん、それはわかってるけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I had already thought about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had already thought about that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、それって猫でそもそも話が出来ないから？　それとも、見られるのがいやだからってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's make something clear here. You won't do it because he won't be able to understand you when you're a cat, or because you don't want him to see you as a cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's make something clear here. You won't do it because he won't be able to understand you when you're a cat, or because you don't want him to see you as a cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「両方ですわ…」
`佐々美@「だって、きちんと宮沢様と話をしたことなんて、数えるほどしかありませんもの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I mean, I have only talked to him a few times...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I mean, I have only talked to him a few times...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに、ふたりでだなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And being alone with him would be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And being alone with him would be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも僕、もしかしたら、謙吾とは話が出来るんじゃないかって考えてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I believe you may be able to talk to Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I believe you may be able to talk to Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええっ…」
`理樹@「ダメかなぁ…」
`佐々美@「も、もう少し考える時間をくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝C-Could I have a bit more time to think about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝C-Could I have a bit more time to think about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
これで、解決するなら万々歳ってところだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I would be elated if this resolves everything...
MESSAGE.Translation: I would be elated if this resolves everything...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「や、やっぱりだめですわぁ～…」
`理樹@「えーっ、なんで？」
`佐々美@「だだだってっ、どんな話をしたらいいか、全然わかりませんものっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝B-B-Because I have no idea whatsoever to talk about!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝B-B-Because I have no idea whatsoever to talk about!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まずは事情を話してさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure you do. First, you tell him what's going on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure you do. First, you tell him what's going on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じ、事情？　事情ってなんですのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-What is going on? What are you saying is going on!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-What is going on? What are you saying is going on!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ううぅ…」
…なんか、人見知りしてる鈴を見てるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This reminded me of when Rin would lose her composure when with someone unfamiliar.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This reminded me of when Rin would lose her composure when with someone unfamiliar.

MESSAGE.JP: 恋愛沙汰に関しては、当時の鈴の社交性と同じレベルなのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: When it came to romance, Sasasegawa-san might have been as shy as Rin used to be...
MESSAGE.Translation: When it came to romance, Sasasegawa-san might have been as shy as Rin used to be...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、それに、その…」
`理樹@「大丈夫だよ、笹瀬川さん!!」
`佐々美@「え、ええ？」
`理樹@「謙吾はきっと困ってる人を放ってはおけないはずだよ。むしろ、今がチャンスじゃないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can tell you, Kengo wouldn't leave someone in trouble alone. Or rather, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can tell you, Kengo wouldn't leave someone in trouble alone. Or rather, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにここ数日見てて思ったけど、笹瀬川さんはもっと自信持っていいと思う!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And having spent a few days with you, I can tell you are much greater than you think yourself to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And having spent a few days with you, I can tell you are much greater than you think yourself to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頑張り屋さんだし、すごく料理も上手いし、何よりかわいいじゃないか!!　だからきっと大丈夫だよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're a hard worker, good at cooking, and so pretty!! You can't fail!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're a hard worker, good at cooking, and so pretty!! You can't fail!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああ、あの、その…」
`佐々美@「手、離して欲しいのですけれど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you mind letting go of my hand...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you mind letting go of my hand...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、ごめんっ」
ついヒートアップして、笹瀬川さんの手を握ってしまっていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was too excited to notice I had seized her hand in the heat of the moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was too excited to notice I had seized her hand in the heat of the moment...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あのですわねっ、この際ですから言っておきますけれどっ」
`理樹@「え、なに？」
`佐々美@「い、言っておきますけど…」
`佐々美@「その…」
なんだろう。
`佐々美@「あなたとここの所、ずっと過ごしてきましたけどっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have spent quite some time here with you, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have spent quite some time here with you, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「宮沢様はずっと憧れでっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have idolized Miyazawa-sama for quite some time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have idolized Miyazawa-sama for quite some time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それで、その…」
`佐々美@「あ、憧れているので…」
`理樹@「うん…落ち着いてからでいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... Take your time and calm down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... Take your time and calm down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「落ち着かないから慌ててるんですのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am upset because I cannot calm down!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am upset because I cannot calm down!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃそうだ。
しかし、謙吾のことでこんなに慌てるなんて、よっぽど謙吾のことが好きなんだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was obvious that she adored Kengo, what with how flustered she got while talking about him.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was obvious that she adored Kengo, what with how flustered she got while talking about him.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと、寂しい。
MESSAGE.EN: It made me feel a tinge of loneliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made me feel a tinge of loneliness.

MESSAGE.JP: いやいや、何考えてるんだ僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: No, no, what was I thinking?
MESSAGE.Translation: No, no, what was I thinking?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ですから、なんですの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So what is it you want me to do!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So what is it you want me to do!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　い、いや、なんですっていわれても」
`理樹@「謙吾と話、してくれる？」
`佐々美@「し、しかた…ありませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-There... seems to be no other choice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-There... seems to be no other choice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ、仕方、ないからですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's right, we have no other choice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's right, we have no other choice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…笹瀬川さん」
`佐々美@「は、はい？」
`理樹@「やっぱり、嫌？」
`佐々美@「い、いいえっ、嫌だなんて、そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝N-No, it's not that I don't want to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝N-No, it's not that I don't want to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そりゃあ、憧れの宮沢様ですものっ。ええ、憧れておりますのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's Miyazawa-sama after all, the person I admire. Yes, he is the one I admire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's Miyazawa-sama after all, the person I admire. Yes, he is the one I admire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、無理してるなら…」
`佐々美@「何を無理することがありますのっ!?　いいですわっ!!　行きますわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why would I be forcing myself!? All right, then!! Let us go!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why would I be forcing myself!? All right, then!! Let us go!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…それなら、いいんだけど…」
`理樹@「でも、話すだけでいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But are you alright with just talking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But are you alright with just talking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だ、だけってなんですの」
`理樹@「いや…その、告白とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean... Don't you want to confess your feelings to him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean... Don't you want to confess your feelings to him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんな大それたこと
できるわけありませんわっ!!
何を考えてらっしゃ
いますのっ!?」
`理樹@
だぁいそれた
ことぉってぇっ
胸倉を掴まれて、がくがく揺さぶられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She had seized me by the collar and was shaking me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had seized me by the collar and was shaking me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしはお話をさせていただくだけで十分ですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will be satisfied with just talking to him!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will be satisfied with just talking to him!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ああ、そ、そう…」
こういう『好き』っていう場合、告白にいくっていうのが普通なんじゃないかって思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: If you like someone that much, you should tell them how you feel.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you like someone that much, you should tell them how you feel.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、本当に難しい。
猫になった笹瀬川さんを後ろに、謙吾の部屋へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: In her cat form, she followed me to Kengo's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: In her cat form, she followed me to Kengo's room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、どうしよう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, how do you want to do this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, how do you want to do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ど、どうしたらいいんですのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What do you think I should do!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What do you think I should do!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いやそれを訊いてるんだけど。
それにしても、今の笹瀬川さんは女王様的な威厳もないし、なんだかひどく弱ってみえる。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, she didn't carry her usual air of a dignified princess. If anything, she only looked weak and frail.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, she didn't carry her usual air of a dignified princess. If anything, she only looked weak and frail.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（うーん…なんだろ、いつもの笹瀬川さんと何が違うんだろう）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hmm... She's far from her usual self right now. I wonder why?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hmm... She's far from her usual self right now. I wonder why?)

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと考えてみる。
`理樹@「あ」
そういえば、鈴との対決のとき、周りのソフト部に持ち上げられてやる気出してたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I just remembered that every time she had a fight with Rin, she was cheered on by her cohorts.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just remembered that every time she had a fight with Rin, she was cheered on by her cohorts.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんには、そういうのが必要なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably required something like that before doing something important.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably required something like that before doing something important.

MESSAGE.JP: 歩を進めるたび、笹瀬川さんの足取りは鈍くなっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: With each step we took, her gait seemed heavier.
MESSAGE.Translation: With each step we took, her gait seemed heavier.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
そして、到着。
`理樹@「じゃ、僕が呼び出すよ」
`佐々美@「え、ええ…」
ドアを二回、ノックする。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked twice on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked twice on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾」
`謙吾@「開いてるぞ」
`理樹@「いや、ちょっと用があるんだ。出てきてくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I have something to tell you. Can you come out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I have something to tell you. Can you come out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、とうとう俺にも話してくれる気になったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Aha, you finally decided to let me in on the truth, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Aha, you finally decided to let me in on the truth, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「でも、話すのは僕からじゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I'm not going to be the one to tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I'm not going to be the one to tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん？　じゃあ誰か他にいるのか？」
`理樹@「謙吾、いい？　驚かないで欲しいんだ」
`謙吾@「わかった。何があろうと驚かんぞ」
`理樹@「実は、この…」
後ろを向く。
何もいない。
`理樹@「ええぇーっ!?　い、いないっ!?」
`謙吾@「おまえが一番驚いてるじゃないか」
`理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと待ってっ」
笹瀬川さんは、廊下の角に小さくなって隠れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was hiding in a corner of the hallway, huddled up like a small animal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was hiding in a corner of the hallway, huddled up like a small animal.

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、猫だから小さいとかじゃなくて、比喩的な意味で。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it's not because she was a cat. I meant that figuratively.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it's not because she was a cat. I meant that figuratively.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、いた…」
`佐々美@「ち、ちょっと心を落ち着けてから…」
`理樹@「うん…」
やっぱり、相当無理してるんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was right, she was totally forcing herself to do this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was right, she was totally forcing herself to do this.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹」
`理樹@「うわぁっ!!」
`謙吾@「なんなんだ、そのおまえの驚きっぷりは…」
`理樹@「だ、だって、突然後ろにいるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝B-Because I didn't notice you behind me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝B-Because I didn't notice you behind me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「で、なんなんだ一体」
`理樹@「ほ、ほらっ」
`佐々美@「み、み…」
`佐々美@「みやっ…」
`理樹@「うんっ」
後ちょっとだっ。
最初の一言さえ言えれば、後はきっと…。
MESSAGE.EN: If she managed to say the first word, she should be able to say the rest well...
MESSAGE.Translation: If she managed to say the first word, she should be able to say the rest well...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「みゃ～」
`謙吾@「変な鳴き声の猫だな」
`理樹@「うわぁっ」
後一歩のところでつまづいた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She stumbled before the finishing line...
MESSAGE.Translation: She stumbled before the finishing line...

MESSAGE.JP: …そして、笹瀬川さんはそのまま走り去っていった。
`理樹@「ああっ…」
`理樹@「ごめん、謙吾」
追いかけて、走り出そうとすると。
MESSAGE.EN: I was just about to go after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was just about to go after her.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹」
謙吾に呼び止められた。
`謙吾@「…おやすみ」
`理樹@「う、うん…おやすみ」
それだけ言うと、謙吾は部屋へ戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He then went back to his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He then went back to his room.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、部屋にまで戻って来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was back in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was back in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、いた…」
`佐々美@「や、やっぱり、その…あなたひとりで行った方がいいんじゃありません？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A-Are you sure... it will not work out if you go and talk to him without me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A-Are you sure... it will not work out if you go and talk to him without me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー…」
ぼん。
…といった所で、元に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: She changed back into a human.
MESSAGE.Translation: She changed back into a human.

MESSAGE.JP: 元に戻った笹瀬川さんは、部屋の角に向かって両手をついてうなだれている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was crouched in the corner of the room with her head in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was crouched in the corner of the room with her head in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごく後ろ向きになっていた…。
`佐々美@「だ、だって、頼むならあなたのほうが宮沢様と親しいでしょうし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I mean, you are a close friend of Miyazawa-sama...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I mean, you are a close friend of Miyazawa-sama...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに、その…」
`理樹@「だってさ、笹瀬川さんは謙吾と話をしたいって言ってたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you did say you wanted to talk to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you did say you wanted to talk to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「い、言いましたけどっ」
`佐々美@「言いましたけど…」
`理樹@「けど？」
`佐々美@「それは言葉のアヤですわっ」
`理樹@「ええぇ…」
`佐々美@「だ、だからっ、必要ないことをわざわざする必要があって!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝S-So, why should I have to go out of my way to do something unnecessary!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝S-So, why should I have to go out of my way to do something unnecessary!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん」
…困った。
MESSAGE.EN: It turned into quite the ordeal...
MESSAGE.Translation: It turned into quite the ordeal...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、ひょっとして」
`佐々美@「なんですの」
`理樹@「…好きな人と話とかしたことって、全然なかったりする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've never talked to someone you have romantic feelings for, have you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've never talked to someone you have romantic feelings for, have you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そそそそっ、そんなことはありませんでしてよっ」
`佐々美@「わたくしほどにもなれば、言い寄ってくる男は数知れませんわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am so beautiful that there are boys courting me left and right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am so beautiful that there are boys courting me left and right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、相川君もそうだったなぁ。
`理樹@「でも、笹瀬川さんの…」
`佐々美@「う・る・さ・いですわねっ!!　わたくしがダメと言ったらダメなんですのよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Shut your mouth!! If I said I'm not doing it, I'm not doing it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Shut your mouth!! If I said I'm not doing it, I'm not doing it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…」
なんだろう…。
笹瀬川さんって、本当に謙吾の事、好きなのかなぁ…？
MESSAGE.EN: Was Sasasegawa-san really in love with Kengo...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was Sasasegawa-san really in love with Kengo...?

MESSAGE.JP: 逆にここまで嫌がるって…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why is she so against talking to him...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is she so against talking to him...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（乙女心は難しい…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(A girl's mind is difficult to understand...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(A girl's mind is difficult to understand...)

MESSAGE.JP: とは言ったものの。
`理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
`佐々美@「な、なんですの」
`理樹@「僕が言うのもなんだけど…謙吾はすごく鈍いからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know if I have the right to say this, but Kengo is pretty bad at recognizing this sort of stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know if I have the right to say this, but Kengo is pretty bad at recognizing this sort of stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん自身が話をしたいとか…ちゃんと、面と向かって話さなきゃ、伝わらないと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He'll never realize you're looking to talk to him... unless you look him in the face and tell him it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He'll never realize you're looking to talk to him... unless you look him in the face and tell him it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…わかってますわよ、そんなこと…」
`佐々美@「でもっ、わたくしがまともに話の出来た殿方なんて、あなたくらいしか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But you are the only boy that I can speak with normally...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But you are the only boy that I can speak with normally...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…」
何回目の『ええぇ』だろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How many times had I said 'eehh' by that point...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many times had I said 'eehh' by that point...?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あっ、いえっ、違いますのよ!?　わたくしがコウイを持って、という…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uh, no, this is not what you think! I mean, the only boy that I like and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uh, no, this is not what you think! I mean, the only boy that I like and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、目の前で次々に自爆して行く…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's self-destructing right in front of me...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's self-destructing right in front of me...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのさ、思うんだけど」
`理樹@「そんなに思いつめなくてもいいんじゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to torment yourself so much over this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to torment yourself so much over this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんにとって謙吾は憧れの人なんだと思うけど」
`理樹@「僕に話すものと思ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But can't you try talking to him like you talk to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But can't you try talking to him like you talk to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だってっ、何を話したら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I have no idea what to talk about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I have no idea what to talk about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ、前に言ってたじゃない。昔謙吾に助けてもらったってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You do have something to talk about. You said he helped you out before, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You do have something to talk about. You said he helped you out before, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのことをまず伝えたらどうかな」
`佐々美@「そ、そうですわね…」
やった、少し前向きになってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank god, she's finally feeling a bit more positive.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank god, she's finally feeling a bit more positive.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「でも、宮沢様はそのこと、覚えてくださってるかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I wonder if he remembers that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I wonder if he remembers that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうだろう…」
少なくとも、今までそんな話は聞いたことがなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: At least, he's never told me anything about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least, he's never told me anything about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなた、先にそれだけ確かめてくださらないかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you ask him if he remembers before I approach him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you ask him if he remembers before I approach him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　それこそ、直接訊いたほうが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? I think that's something you should ask him directly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? I think that's something you should ask him directly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いいからそれくらい、頼みましたわよっ」
`理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…」
笹瀬川さんを後ろに、再び謙吾の部屋へ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san tailed me on a second trip to Kengo's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san tailed me on a second trip to Kengo's room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…謙吾？」
ノックをしようとして気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed just before I knocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed just before I knocked.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…」
電気が消えていた。
`理樹@「もう寝ちゃったみたいだ」
`佐々美@「じゃあ、明日ですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right then, we should leave this for tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right then, we should leave this for tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないか」
ふたりでほっと息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: We both let out a sigh of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both let out a sigh of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: …って、なんで僕まで…。
結局そのまま、寝ることになった。
MESSAGE.EN: Having nothing else to do, we decided to go to sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having nothing else to do, we decided to go to sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: あんまり先送りにするのもよくないと思うけど、こればっかりはしょうがない。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to get this done as quickly as possible, but there's nothing we can do about it right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to get this done as quickly as possible, but there's nothing we can do about it right now.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がもういなかったら、明日の朝、もう僕しかいないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Rin has already gone, I was going to be the only one joining Kengo for breakfast that next morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Rin has already gone, I was going to be the only one joining Kengo for breakfast that next morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はなんて思うだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What will he say about that...
MESSAGE.Translation: What will he say about that...

MESSAGE.JP: …気が重いなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like there was a huge weight on me...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like there was a huge weight on me...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ねえ、起きてます？」
`理樹@「ん」
`理樹@「…うん」
`佐々美@「…わたし、情けないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I really am pathetic, are I not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I really am pathetic, are I not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「すごく、簡単なことですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This is such an easy thing to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This is such an easy thing to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…簡単ですのに、どうして出来ないんでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Despite that, why can I not do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Despite that, why can I not do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…」
`理樹@「でもさ、僕だってちょっとわかるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I kind of understand how you feel, though. ❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I kind of understand how you feel, though. ❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「言えないよね、簡単にはさ」
`理樹@「話をするって言うのは、難しいんだ」
`理樹@「…簡単に出来る人だって、もちろんいるんだろうけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course, there are people who have no trouble doing it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course, there are people who have no trouble doing it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしは…」
`理樹@「うん」
`理樹@「…なに？」
`佐々美@「や、やっぱり、なんでもないですわ」
`理樹@「あ、そう…」
`佐々美@「…はあ」
`佐々美@「せめて、猫になんてならなければ良かったんですのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I wish that I at least wouldn't turn into a cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I wish that I at least wouldn't turn into a cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだけどね…」
`佐々美@「しかも、黒猫だなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And a black cat, of all things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And a black cat, of all things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「黒猫って…」
ああ…笹瀬川さんが昔飼ってたのも、黒猫なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah... it was also a black cat that she used to feed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah... it was also a black cat that she used to feed.

MESSAGE.JP: …特に黒猫が嫌いって言うのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: She disliked black cats more than any other type of cat because...
MESSAGE.Translation: She disliked black cats more than any other type of cat because...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今でも、つい黒猫を見ると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even now, every time I see a black cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even now, every time I see a black cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「探してしまいますのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I cannot help but look around for him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I cannot help but look around for him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
きっと、すごく可愛がっていたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have loved him so much.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have loved him so much.

MESSAGE.JP: 何年もたった今でも、忘れてないくらいに。
MESSAGE.EN: So much that she couldn't forget about him even now.
MESSAGE.Translation: So much that she couldn't forget about him even now.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このまま、元に戻って帰れなかったら、どうなるのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I wonder what will happen if I return to the real world like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I wonder what will happen if I return to the real world like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「帰っても、猫のままだったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If I am still a cat when we go back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If I am still a cat when we go back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…あなたの飼い猫になって暮らしていくのも、悪くないかもしれませんわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I suppose being your pet cat would not be so bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I suppose being your pet cat would not be so bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだって、そんな風に考えちゃさ」
`理樹@「きっと全部元に戻って帰れるんだ。そう信じなきゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everything will return to the way it was, and we'll return to normal as well. We must believe that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everything will return to the way it was, and we'll return to normal as well. We must believe that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばふ、ふとんを被る音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her wrap herself in her blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her wrap herself in her blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん？」
`佐々美@「なんでもないですわよっ、そうですわねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Never mind! Yes, you are absolutely correct!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Never mind! Yes, you are absolutely correct!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…」
何で怒ってるんだ。
`理樹@「なんかまずいこと言った？　僕」
`佐々美@「自分の胸に聞いてみたらどうですのっ」
…理不尽に怒られても、こっちはなんだかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't really understand why she got mad like that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't really understand why she got mad like that...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとむっとした。
MESSAGE.EN: It kind of irritated me, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: It kind of irritated me, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、笹瀬川さんが前向きにやってくれなきゃ、出来るものも出来なくなっちゃうじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, I need you to have a better outlook on our future, otherwise we'll even fail at the things we can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, I need you to have a better outlook on our future, otherwise we'll even fail at the things we can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまり後ろ向き過ぎると、こっちだってどうしていいかわからないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you continue being so negative, I won't know what we should do, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you continue being so negative, I won't know what we should do, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですけどっ」
`佐々美@「正論ばっかり言う男は嫌われますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝However, I dislike men who are always making sound arguments!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝However, I dislike men who are always making sound arguments!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だってそうじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not saying anything wrong, am I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not saying anything wrong, am I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうでも頷けない時はありますのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No, but there are times when I simply cannot agree!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No, but there are times when I simply cannot agree!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「大体、あなたがいるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To begin with, it is because you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To begin with, it is because you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕がいるから？」
`佐々美@「お、お手洗いに行ってきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I am going to visit the bathroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I am going to visit the bathroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
…どうしたものかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no idea what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no idea what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だって一生懸命やってるし、笹瀬川さんだって頑張ってくれなきゃ解決しないのは本当じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: I've been doing my best, and she needed to do the same so we could figure this out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've been doing my best, and she needed to do the same so we could figure this out.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…わたくしだって、こんなことで悩みたくないですのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to let this bother me either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to let this bother me either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
…猫になって、出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning into the cat, she left the room...
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning into the cat, she left the room...

MESSAGE.JP: 言い過ぎたかなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I might have said too much...
MESSAGE.Translation: I might have said too much...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ」
隠し事をして何かするって、上手くいかないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Things never went well when I tried to keep something from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Things never went well when I tried to keep something from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 多分それは、お互い様。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was the same for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was the same for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんだって、僕だって、言えない事なんていっぱいあるんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure we both had things we couldn't tell each other...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure we both had things we couldn't tell each other...

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんはなかなか帰ってこない。
`理樹@（さっきの、謝っておいた方がいいかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I should probably apologize for what I said earlier...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I should probably apologize for what I said earlier...)

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとムキになってしまったことを反省する。
無理を言ってるのは、実際には僕のほうなんだし。
MESSAGE.EN: In reality, I was the one who said something unreasonable.
MESSAGE.Translation: In reality, I was the one who said something unreasonable.

MESSAGE.JP: かりかり…。
`理樹@「ん」
ドアを引っかく音が聞こえる。笹瀬川さんが帰ってきたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard scratching sounds from the door. She must be back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard scratching sounds from the door. She must be back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？」
閉まってなかったと思うけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think the door was closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think the door was closed.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドから降りて確認しても、やっぱり閉まってはいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I got out of my bed and verified it was open.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got out of my bed and verified it was open.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そこ、開いてるけど…」
`黒猫@「にゃぁー」
今のは笹瀬川さんの声じゃない。
猫の声だ。
`理樹@「え…ちょっと、どうしたのさ」
ドアを開ける。
`黒猫@「みぅ…」
鳴真似なんかでもない。完全に猫の声だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't an act... it was a true cat's cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't an act... it was a true cat's cry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんっ、声っ」
僕が言うと。
猫は背を向けて、走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...the cat turned around and ran off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...the cat turned around and ran off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、ちょっとっ」
僕も追いかけて飛び出す。
猫はそのまま外まで走っていく。
`理樹@「待ってってばっ」
靴を突っかけて、その後を追う。
MESSAGE.EN: I hastily stepped into my shoes and chased after the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hastily stepped into my shoes and chased after the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: …どういうことだろう。
笹瀬川さんが本当に猫になった…？
MESSAGE.EN: Did Sasasegawa-san turn into a real cat...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did Sasasegawa-san turn into a real cat...?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『自分の体が自分じゃなくなるんですもの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It feels like your own body is no longer your own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It feels like your own body is no longer your own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『それに、長く猫でいると…本当に自分が猫になってしまったような感覚に襲われますの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And on top of that, the longer I stay a cat... the more it feels like I really am becoming a cat..❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And on top of that, the longer I stay a cat... the more it feels like I really am becoming a cat..❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは、すごくまずいことなんじゃないか。
いやな予感が、どんどん膨らんでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: An unpleasant feeling began to grow inside of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: An unpleasant feeling began to grow inside of me.

MESSAGE.JP: ここに着いた。
入れないはずの場所。
MESSAGE.EN: I had made it into the place we were not supposed to be able to enter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had made it into the place we were not supposed to be able to enter.

MESSAGE.JP: …ここに何があるって言うんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What did the cat want to show me?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What did the cat want to show me?

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「みぃー」
黒猫は、廃棄物の山の上に立ち、声を上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat was crying atop a mountain of trash.
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat was crying atop a mountain of trash.

MESSAGE.JP: ここが特別な場所だっていうのは、間違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell that this place was special.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell that this place was special.

MESSAGE.JP: じゃあ…。
`理樹@「ここに、何があるって言うのさ…」
`理樹@「それとも、誰かいるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or is there someone here you want me to meet...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or is there someone here you want me to meet...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫の黄色い目が、こっちを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat stared at me with it's yellow eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat stared at me with it's yellow eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: この猫は、いつかの恭介みたいに…誰かが操ってるものなんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe someone was manipulating the cat, just like Kyousuke did...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe someone was manipulating the cat, just like Kyousuke did...

MESSAGE.JP: と、すると。
`理樹@「この世界を作った『マスター』はここにいるんじゃないの…？」
`理樹@「ねえ、誰かいるんじゃないの？」
周りに声をかける。
反応はない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I didn't get any reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I didn't get any reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 代わりに。
頭の中に、声が響く。
MESSAGE.EN: A voice began to echo in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: A voice began to echo in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: …それは文字のようでもあって。
イメージとしての言葉が、頭の中に響いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear words as images in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear words as images in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、そう伝えられる。
`理樹@「…どういうこと…？」
`理樹@「ここにいるのは、黒猫だけじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's just me and that black cat here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's just me and that black cat here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それとも、『ここ』じゃない世界の『ここ』のこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or, when you say 'here,' do you mean 'here' in the real world?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or, when you say 'here,' do you mean 'here' in the real world?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「現実の『ここ』っていうこと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell me, what do you really mean by ❛here❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell me, what do you really mean by ❛here❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それっきり、何も起こることはなかった。
`理樹@「…誰がいるって言うのさ…」
これはきっと、何かのヒントにはなるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: This had to be a hint.
MESSAGE.Translation: This had to be a hint.

MESSAGE.JP: なるんだろうけど…。
`理樹@「これでいったい何を捜せって言うんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to search for with that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to search for with that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヒントどころか、これ自体がひとつの謎掛けみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite looking like a hint, it also seemed like a riddle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite looking like a hint, it also seemed like a riddle.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫から笹瀬川さんの声がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Sasasegawa-san's voice from the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Sasasegawa-san's voice from the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん？」
`佐々美@「…なんですの？　ふああぁ…」
…寝てるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she was asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she was asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…大丈夫っぽい？」
`佐々美@「だからなんですの…」
`理樹@「い、いや…大丈夫ならいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A-Actually, you seem fine, so never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A-Actually, you seem fine, so never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そう…じゃ、お休みなさいませ」
`理樹@「いやいや、ここ外だから…って、寝ちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a sec, we're outsi... Rats, she fell asleep again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a sec, we're outsi... Rats, she fell asleep again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 仕方ない、猫の姿なら軽いし、抱えて帰ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Guess I was going to have to carry her back. At least she was light as a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess I was going to have to carry her back. At least she was light as a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に帰る前に、もう一度あの場所へ戻ってみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to go back into that place once more before returning to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to go back into that place once more before returning to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行けない…」
本当に、なんだったんだ…？
『ここにいる』。
あそこにいたのは、僕と黒猫だけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, only the black cat and I were there.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, only the black cat and I were there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…だけ、じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... it wasn't just the cat and I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... it wasn't just the cat and I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『いた』って意味じゃ、笹瀬川さんだっていたことになる。
MESSAGE.EN: As far as being there, Sasasegawa-san was also there.
MESSAGE.Translation: As far as being there, Sasasegawa-san was also there.

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度よく、考えてみよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I went over what happened once more...
MESSAGE.Translation: I went over what happened once more...

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…。
今、寝てた。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I was just sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I was just sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、夢見てたっけ…？
MESSAGE.EN: But did I have any dreams...?
MESSAGE.Translation: But did I have any dreams...?

MESSAGE.JP: まどろみながら、考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to remember through my grogginess.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to remember through my grogginess.

MESSAGE.JP: 見てた夢を思い出せないなんてことは、よくあるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing unusual about being unable to remember your dreams...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing unusual about being unable to remember your dreams...

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか、妙に気になって…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I was strangely curious about the one I think I just had...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I was strangely curious about the one I think I just had...

MESSAGE.JP: 翌朝。
`理樹@（あんまり眠れなかった…）
いつもより早く目が覚めてしまって、結局そのまま二度寝に入ることができなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd woken up earlier than normal, and couldn't fall back asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd woken up earlier than normal, and couldn't fall back asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ、みんなにメール出しておこう…」
一応、朝のメンバー全員に送っておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrote a message to everyone I normally ate with.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrote a message to everyone I normally ate with.

MESSAGE.JP: 『用事があるから、今日はみんな一緒に朝は食べれないみたい。ごめんね』
MESSAGE.EN: [Sorry, I can't eat with you this morning. Got some work to do.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Sorry, I can't eat with you this morning. Got some work to do.]

MESSAGE.JP: 送信する。
…ひとまず、これでみんながいないことはごまかせるだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I hoped that would cover up the fact that people had disappeared...
MESSAGE.Translation: I hoped that would cover up the fact that people had disappeared...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら？　今日は早いんですのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh dear. You are up rather early today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh dear. You are up rather early today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
仕方がない。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't much more I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't much more I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: …後は、笹瀬川さんにがんばってもらうしかないからなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: The rest depended on Sasasegawa-san putting in some effort...
MESSAGE.Translation: The rest depended on Sasasegawa-san putting in some effort...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、笹瀬川さんも早いね…」
`佐々美@「昨日はあんまり眠れませんでしたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I did not sleep particularly well last night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I did not sleep particularly well last night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは笹瀬川さんで、緊張してるんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure Sasasegawa-san had her own things to worry about...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure Sasasegawa-san had her own things to worry about...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりで渡り廊下を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked down the outdoor corridor by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked down the outdoor corridor by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 静かだ。
それが僕一人でいるせいか、朝早いからなのか、どっちなのかはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't sure if it was because of how early it was or because I was alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't sure if it was because of how early it was or because I was alone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
…リトルバスターズのメンバーが、誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized I hadn't run across a single member of the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized I hadn't run across a single member of the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはいつも早いし、まだここに残ってるはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud usually got up early, and she was supposed to still be here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud usually got up early, and she was supposed to still be here.

MESSAGE.JP: 始業五分前になる。
MESSAGE.EN: Five minutes before the first class.
MESSAGE.Translation: Five minutes before the first class.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰も来ない…」
それどころか、教室の席は半分も埋まっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not only that, but less than half of the class was present.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not only that, but less than half of the class was present.

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「じゃ、ちょっと早いが始めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝It's a little early, but I think we'll begin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝It's a little early, but I think we'll begin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『いつもどおり』にホームルームが始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Homeroom started 'just like any other day.'
MESSAGE.Translation: Homeroom started 'just like any other day.'

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ちょっと待ってよ…）
葉留佳さんもクドも、まだ一回も顔を見てないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't seen Haruka-san or Kud yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't seen Haruka-san or Kud yet.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりとも、もういないってことなのか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Does that mean they're not here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does that mean they're not here?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、なにより。
`理樹@（謙吾がいない…!!）
と、教室の後ろのドアが開いた。
`謙吾@「…遅くなりました」
`先生@「ああ、早く席に着け」
ほっとする。
謙吾はまだ残ってた。
謙吾は教室を見渡した後。
そのまま、自分の席に着いた。
ホームルームが終わって。
…謙吾が僕の席に来た。
`謙吾@「理樹」
`理樹@「うん…なに？」
`謙吾@「理樹。ここはどこだ」
さすがに、もう気づいてる。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, he had realized it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, he had realized it.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「お前からは何も訊くなと言われたが、考えるなとは言われていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You told me not to ask you, but you didn't tell me not to think for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You told me not to ask you, but you didn't tell me not to think for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は俺なりに、ここが異世界であると、考えてみた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And I get this feeling that we're in another world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And I get this feeling that we're in another world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹、ここはなんだ？　なぜ誰もいない？　お前はそれを知っているのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, what is this place? Why is nobody else here? Can you answer those questions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, what is this place? Why is nobody else here? Can you answer those questions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾…」
`謙吾@「言えないのか」
`理樹@「僕の口からは言えないんだ」
`理樹@「けど、話せる人がいる」
`理樹@「昨日は、ちょっと無理だったけど…」
`謙吾@「じゃあ、今からでもいい。そいつのところに連れて行ってくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝In that case, take me to that person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝In that case, take me to that person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええっ」
いきなりじゃ結果は見えてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I instantly knew how it would play out...
MESSAGE.Translation: I instantly knew how it would play out...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうせこんな世界だ。授業も何も、もう関係ないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's not like there's any point in attending class in this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's not like there's any point in attending class in this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、そうだけど…」
`理樹@「ちょっと、準備の時間をくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I have a little time to prepare?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I have a little time to prepare?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…そうか。話してくれるなら、少しくらい待ってもかまわない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay, I don't mind waiting a little longer so long as I get to hear the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay, I don't mind waiting a little longer so long as I get to hear the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ならば俺は、裏庭にいる。ここの空気は、居心地が悪いからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Meet me in the backyard. I don't like the mood in here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Meet me in the backyard. I don't like the mood in here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
…笹瀬川さんを呼びに行こう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to go get Sasasegawa-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to go get Sasasegawa-san...

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に出る。
歩けば、その僕の足音だけが耳に響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could only hear my own steps as I walked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could only hear my own steps as I walked.

MESSAGE.JP: 静かだ…。
始業後の休み時間なんだから、いつもだったらもっとざわついてるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I would have been way noisier had this been my normal school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would have been way noisier had this been my normal school.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなにもう、人がいないんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: There must not be many people left now.
MESSAGE.Translation: There must not be many people left now.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、窓の外を見た。
`理樹@「…なに、あれ」
それを確かめに、屋上に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the roof to verify what I saw.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the roof to verify what I saw.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、なんと言えばいいのか。
不思議な、光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It really was a bizarre sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really was a bizarre sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 他に表現しようがないくらい。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the best way I could think to describe it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the best way I could think to describe it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「消えてる…」
町並みが白に包まれている。
MESSAGE.EN: The entire town was shrouded in white.
MESSAGE.Translation: The entire town was shrouded in white.

MESSAGE.JP: もうそこには、何もないって言うことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guessed there wasn't anything there anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guessed there wasn't anything there anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: これはつまり。
`理樹@「破綻、だ」
世界が維持できなくなっているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed that the master could no longer maintain it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed that the master could no longer maintain it.

MESSAGE.JP: どんどん縮小されていっているのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite this world's rapidly decreasing population,
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite this world's rapidly decreasing population,

MESSAGE.JP: それでも間に合わないほど。
波間に作った砂の城の様に。
MESSAGE.EN: This was like a sand castle on a beach.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was like a sand castle on a beach.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、それはふさわしくない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that analogy wasn't quite right.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that analogy wasn't quite right.

MESSAGE.JP: この世界は、煙の雲だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This world was like a cloud of smoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: This world was like a cloud of smoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上って、空気の白に溶けて消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: It dissolved even as it rose into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: It dissolved even as it rose into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 朧気で儚い、不思議な光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a fragile, peculiar spectacle.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a fragile, peculiar spectacle.

MESSAGE.JP: もし、だ。
もし、この世界の意味を全うする前に、世界がなくなってしまったら。
MESSAGE.EN: If this world were to come to an end before it could fulfill the reason it was created,
MESSAGE.Translation: If this world were to come to an end before it could fulfill the reason it was created,

MESSAGE.JP: 何も出来ないまま、終わってしまうじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: wouldn't it all have been meaningless?
MESSAGE.Translation: wouldn't it all have been meaningless?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんとか、しなきゃ」
…僕は、きっと。
MESSAGE.EN: At that point, I probably should have...
MESSAGE.Translation: At that point, I probably should have...

MESSAGE.JP: この時、破綻の意味を考えるべきだったんだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...thought about why the world had begun to collapse.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...thought about why the world had begun to collapse.

MESSAGE.JP: 世界が消えていく。
それが、どういうことなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I should have considered what that could mean.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should have considered what that could mean.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんっ」
部屋では、笹瀬川さんが鏡とにらめっこしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking herself over in the mirror.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking herself over in the mirror.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あら、どうしましたの？」
`理樹@「うん…まずいことになってる」
`理樹@「もう、学校の外がなくなってる」
`佐々美@「は…？」
`理樹@「出られないとかじゃなくて、もう外そのものがないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's no longer a matter of getting out of here or not now - there is simply nothing outside the school walls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's no longer a matter of getting out of here or not now - there is simply nothing outside the school walls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、早く謙吾に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you'd better hurry up and tell Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you'd better hurry up and tell Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ま、待ってくださいますっ？」
`佐々美@「外が消えることと、宮沢様とどういう関係がありますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Does Miyazawa-sama have anything to do with the world outside the walls vanishing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Does Miyazawa-sama have anything to do with the world outside the walls vanishing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、えーと…」
`佐々美@「もしかして、宮沢様が『マスター』ですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you implying he is the master?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you implying he is the master?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええっ」
…そう取られるとは思わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't expect her taking it that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't expect her taking it that way.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それは多分違うと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't think he was.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't think he was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうじゃなくて…」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さんがそう思ってるなら、そうしたほうがいいと思ったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you think he is, you should find out for yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you think he is, you should find out for yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、それは…」
`佐々美@「そ、そう、言いましたけど」
僕も、笹瀬川さんがそう言ったことは覚えてる。
ついでに、本当だったらおせっかいの極みだっていうことも、わかってる。
MESSAGE.EN: And I know I was sticking my nose too deep into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I know I was sticking my nose too deep into it.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わ、わかりましたわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝U-Understood. I will go and talk to him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝U-Understood. I will go and talk to him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、はあ、とひとつ息を吐いて、そう答えてくれた。
`理樹@「うん、じゃあ…」
`佐々美@「あっ、あのっ」
`佐々美@「へ、変なところとかないかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do not look strange, do I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do not look strange, do I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「変なところって…」
`佐々美@「その、髪とか…」
`理樹@「うーん」
…さっき鏡とにらめっこしてたのは、多分そのセットとかだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have been doing her hair when I came in earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have been doing her hair when I came in earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: じっと変なところを探してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I did my best to spot anything she might have missed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did my best to spot anything she might have missed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、大丈夫だと思うよ。いつもどおりの笹瀬川さんだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you're good. No different from usual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you're good. No different from usual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いつもどおりじゃダメですわっ!!　やりなおしますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I need to be different!! I will do it over again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I need to be different!! I will do it over again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: また鏡に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: She went back to the mirror.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went back to the mirror.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えええーっ…」
１０分後。
`佐々美@「じゃ、じゃあ、行きましょうか」
結局僕には何が違うのかわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell what had changed...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell what had changed...

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、本人が納得してるなら、それでいいんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, just as long as she was satisfied.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, just as long as she was satisfied.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
…笹瀬川さんは猫になった。
`理樹@「えーと…思ったこと言っていいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... Can I say what I'm thinking...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... Can I say what I'm thinking...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「却下ですわ」
`理樹@「あ、そう…」
さっきの時間はなんだったんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: The time she spent on her hair... what was it for?
MESSAGE.Translation: The time she spent on her hair... what was it for?

MESSAGE.JP: 何度目かわからない構図で、謙吾の待つ裏庭へと向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't remember how many times we'd already repeated this, but with Sasasegawa-san in tow, I went to see Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't remember how many times we'd already repeated this, but with Sasasegawa-san in tow, I went to see Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…笹瀬川さん」
後ろを歩く笹瀬川さんに声をかける。
`理樹@「足の運びが前後ろ一緒になってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're moving both of your forelegs and hind legs together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're moving both of your forelegs and hind legs together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あら？」
よっぽど緊張しているみたいだ。
裏庭では、謙吾がひとり佇んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo stood in the backyard by himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo stood in the backyard by himself.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿は、瞑想でもしているかのようだった。
`理樹@「じゃあ、どうしよう」
`佐々美@「先にあなたが行ってくださいます？」
`理樹@「うん…」
そういう話だったし、そうすることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I had promised her I'd do that much.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had promised her I'd do that much.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾」
`謙吾@「来たか。で、その話を出来るやつというのはどこだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're here. So where's the one to tell me the story?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're here. So where's the one to tell me the story?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、でも、その前にいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, before that, there's something you need to know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, before that, there's something you need to know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ…前置きはもうたくさんだぞ」
`理樹@「これで最後だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I swear this is the last thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I swear this is the last thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「仕方あるまい。聞こう」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さんのことなんだ」
`謙吾@「笹瀬川？　笹瀬川が何だ」
`理樹@「えーと、あのさ…」
言いよどんでると、足をぺしぺしと叩かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was searching for the right words, Sasasegawa-san hit me several times on the foot.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was searching for the right words, Sasasegawa-san hit me several times on the foot.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかわからないけど、多分ちゃんとやれとかそういうジェスチャーだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I assumed that she was trying to tell me to do this right.
MESSAGE.Translation: I assumed that she was trying to tell me to do this right.

MESSAGE.JP: うなずいてから、謙吾に向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her a nod and turned back to face Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her a nod and turned back to face Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、固まったまま動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: She froze stiff, holding her breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: She froze stiff, holding her breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もしやとは思うが…笹瀬川のことなのか？」
`謙吾@「話が出来る人間がいるというのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is she the one you said is going to tell me the truth...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is she the one you said is going to tell me the truth...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は黙ってうなずいた。
`謙吾@「そうか…」
`謙吾@「高飛車なところもあるし、妙なことをすることもあるが、笹瀬川がいたずらにこんな事をするようなやつとは、俺は思わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She sometimes acts haughtily and does strange things, but I don't think she'd ever pull a prank like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She sometimes acts haughtily and does strange things, but I don't think she'd ever pull a prank like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理由があるなら、もちろん聞くが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If she has something she must say, of course I'll listen to her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If she has something she must say, of course I'll listen to her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だが、俺は…」
`謙吾@「俺は…」
`謙吾@「笹瀬川が、俺に好意を持っていることは、知っている…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I know she has feelings for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I know she has feelings for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾も、気づいてたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: So he has realized that as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: So he has realized that as well.

MESSAGE.JP: あれだけあからさまにアプローチ掛けられてたら、普通はわかるだろうけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, anybody would if they were approached in such a straightforward way...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, anybody would if they were approached in such a straightforward way...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だが、その笹瀬川に、俺は何をすればいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But what am I supposed to do for her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But what am I supposed to do for her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は、その気持ちには…到底応えられない」
言ってしまった…!!
けど、伝えるべきことは伝えないと…!!
MESSAGE.EN: But I still had to say what needed to be said...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still had to say what needed to be said...!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾…」
`理樹@「謙吾は覚えてないかもしれないけどさ…前に、笹瀬川さんのことを謙吾が助けたことがあるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You might not remember anymore... but you helped Sasasegawa-san out once before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You might not remember anymore... but you helped Sasasegawa-san out once before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺が？」
`謙吾@「ふむ…」
考え込んでしまう。
覚えてなさそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But it didn't seem like he remembered...
MESSAGE.Translation: But it didn't seem like he remembered...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あったんでしょ？　笹瀬川さんの大切なものを謙吾が探し出してくれたって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You did, didn't you? I heard you recovered something very important to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You did, didn't you? I heard you recovered something very important to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なに…？」
`謙吾@「ひょっとして、あれか」
`理樹@「思い出した？」
`謙吾@「お前こそ覚えていないのか」
`謙吾@「確かに俺は、笹瀬川の捨てられていたユニフォームを渡したことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I did hand the uniform she'd lost back to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I did hand the uniform she'd lost back to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だがそれは、お前が川から拾い上げてきたものじゃなかったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But you were the one who picked it up out of the river.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But you were the one who picked it up out of the river.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「去年の夏だ。覚えていないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It was last summer. Don't you remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It was last summer. Don't you remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 待て待て…。
そういえば、そんなことがあったような…。
MESSAGE.EN: As he mentioned it, I started to remember something...
MESSAGE.Translation: As he mentioned it, I started to remember something...

MESSAGE.JP: たしか…。
確かあれは、去年の夏、休日に謙吾と買い物に出たときだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was during a holiday last summer; Kengo and I had gone shopping.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was during a holiday last summer; Kengo and I had gone shopping.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、あれは」
`理樹@「え、どうしたの？」
`謙吾@「見覚えのあるユニフォームだな…確か、うちの女子ソフト部のじゃなかったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I recognize that uniform... I believe it belongs to the girls' softball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I recognize that uniform... I believe it belongs to the girls' softball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「見ろ。川の端に引っかかっている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Look, it's stuck there in the river.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Look, it's stuck there in the river.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ほんとだ…」
`理樹@「大事なものだよね、あれ。拾ってあげようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's important to someone. We should get it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's important to someone. We should get it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、そうだな」
`謙吾@「おあつらえ向きに長い竿があったぞ。これに引っ掛けてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We're in luck, there's a long pole here. Let's use this to pick it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We're in luck, there's a long pole here. Let's use this to pick it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
`謙吾@「もう少しだ…よっと」
`理樹@「あっ」
`謙吾@「しまったっ、落とした…!!」
`謙吾@「おいっ、飛び込むやつがあるかっ!!　ここ、結構深いぞっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hey, you can't just dive in!! The river's deep!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hey, you can't just dive in!! The river's deep!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、助かったよ、謙吾」
`謙吾@「ユニフォームじゃなく、お前を釣ることになるとはな。まったく、びしょびしょじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I ended up fishing you up instead of the uniform. Look at you, you're soaked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I ended up fishing you up instead of the uniform. Look at you, you're soaked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは…」
`謙吾@「とにかく、お前は一回寮に戻ったほうがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Anyway, you'd better get back to the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Anyway, you'd better get back to the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…じゃ、謙吾がこれ、早く届けてあげてよ。失くした人は探してるかもしれないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... Then can you take this to its owner? She might be looking for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Then can you take this to its owner? She might be looking for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「わかった、そうしよう」
`謙吾@「と、いうわけだ」
確かに、あった…。
`理樹@「あれ、笹瀬川さんのだったんだ…」
`謙吾@「今まで知らなかったのか？」
`理樹@「うん…」
あれ。
って、この話は、笹瀬川さんが謙吾に憧れるようになった理由で…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the event that caused Sasasegawa-san to develop feelings for Kengo...
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the event that caused Sasasegawa-san to develop feelings for Kengo...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は、もうさっき…。
`謙吾@「とにかく、俺は…」
`佐々美@「…お待ちになって!!」
笹瀬川さんが声を上げ、謙吾の前に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: She exclaimed loudly and stepped in front of him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She exclaimed loudly and stepped in front of him.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ね、猫…？　これは、笹瀬川の声じゃないのか…？」
`謙吾@「理樹、これはどういうことなんだ!!」
謙吾にも、笹瀬川さんの声はわかるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed that he was also able to understand her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed that he was also able to understand her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この世界では、笹瀬川さんが猫になっちゃってるんだ…」
けど。
しまった、という顔。
MESSAGE.EN: It would have been way noisier had this been my normal school.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would have been way noisier had this been my normal school.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきの言葉は…。
MESSAGE.EN: It must be because of what he'd said before...
MESSAGE.Translation: It must be because of what he'd said before...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あの…わたくしは…」
`佐々美@「確かに、宮沢様をお慕いしていましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is true, I had been in love with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is true, I had been in love with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ですが…」
`佐々美@「です、が…？」
笹瀬川さんの言葉が止まる。
`佐々美@「宮沢様…それ、なんですの…？」
…謙吾の体を、白い霧が包んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: A white mist suddenly surrounded Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white mist suddenly surrounded Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「な、なんだこれは!?」
`理樹@「謙吾っ!!」
`謙吾@「くっ…一体…」
`謙吾@「うっ!?」
そしてそのまま…。
MESSAGE.EN: We were unable to do anything...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were unable to do anything...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹っ!!」
`理樹@「け、謙吾…」
`佐々美@「宮沢様っ!?」
`謙吾@「な…どうなっているっ…!?　しかし、これは…!!」
`謙吾@「う、うおおおおおぉおぉぉぉぉーっ!!」
そのまま。
僕らの目の前で、謙吾は霧の中に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo vanished into the fog right in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo vanished into the fog right in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…退場、だ…」
`佐々美@「そんな…」
僕らは呆然と、散っていく白い霧を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us just stood there, dumbfounded, as the white fog started to dissipate.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us just stood there, dumbfounded, as the white fog started to dissipate.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が消えてしまった。
僕が当たりをつけていた世界の意味は、間違っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: What I'd thought was the world's purpose turned out to be entirely wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I'd thought was the world's purpose turned out to be entirely wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 色々考えなきゃいけないことはある。
MESSAGE.EN: And that left me with much to mull over.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that left me with much to mull over.

MESSAGE.JP: あるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: But what mattered the most was...
MESSAGE.Translation: But what mattered the most was...

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんの憧れの理由が、僕だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was the one who caused her to like Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was the one who caused her to like Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしよう…。
…気まずい…。
けど、なんか言わなきゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to say something, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to say something, though...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾、いなくなっちゃったね…」
`佐々美@「いったい、なんですの…」
`佐々美@「わたくしがまるっきり道化じゃありませんこと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am completely the butt of a joke now, am I not...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am completely the butt of a joke now, am I not...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あのさ…」
…こんなとき、なんて声を掛けたらいいんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what to say at times like that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what to say at times like that...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（余計なこと、しなければよかった…）
善意や一生懸命さがこんな結果を招くって、結構辛い…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hard to digest. One of the good deeds I did for someone ended up bringing them such an unpleasant result...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hard to digest. One of the good deeds I did for someone ended up bringing them such an unpleasant result...

MESSAGE.JP: おせっかいっていうのは、本当に…こういうことを言うんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The word officious must exist to describe someone like me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The word officious must exist to describe someone like me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、僕のせいだ…」
`佐々美@「別に…あなたが何をしたからって、変わらなかったと思いますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No... Whatever you did, the result would probably have been the same...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No... Whatever you did, the result would probably have been the same...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「謝られても、逆に困りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Your apology will not get us anywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Your apology will not get us anywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって…」
`佐々美@「だっても何もありませんわっ」
`理樹@「ご、ごめん…」
`佐々美@「だから、謝らなくたっていいですわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Like I said, you need not apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Like I said, you need not apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
とりあえず、笹瀬川さんをひとりにしてあげよう。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like she would like to be left alone for the time being.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like she would like to be left alone for the time being.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、僕ちょっと外出てるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess I'll go out for a walk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess I'll go out for a walk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今はそうしてあげるべきだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Giving her some space would probably be for the best.
MESSAGE.Translation: Giving her some space would probably be for the best.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「待ちなさい」
`佐々美@「…傷心のレディを置いて行くつもりですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you just going to leave a heartbroken lady all alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you just going to leave a heartbroken lady all alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんが、ここにいたほうがいいって言うなら、僕はここにいるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you want me here with you, I'll stay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you want me here with you, I'll stay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、今は笹瀬川さんのそばにいよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I should stay there with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I should stay there with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 何が出来るかわからないけど、出来ることがあるなら、すぐに何かしてあげたいから。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what I could do for her, but I should be around in case she wanted me to do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what I could do for her, but I should be around in case she wanted me to do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず動かない空気の中。
`佐々美@「…振られてしまいましたわ」
ぽつり、とつぶやいた。
`理樹@「うん…」
`佐々美@「さすがに、傷つきますわね…」
`佐々美@「…ですけど」
`佐々美@「なんだかこれで、すっきりもしましたわ」
`佐々美@「それに…薄々ですけど、こうなりそうだとわかってましたもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And I more or less expected it to turn out this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And I more or less expected it to turn out this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おかしな話ですけど…内心、ほっとしてもいるんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You might find this funny... but I do feel some relief.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You might find this funny... but I do feel some relief.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「宮沢様は、憧れのままのほうがいいのかもしれませんわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Perhaps Miyazawa-sama should simply continue to be someone I look up to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Perhaps Miyazawa-sama should simply continue to be someone I look up to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それは、わたくしの勘違いでしたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And, well, I turned out to be mistaken.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And, well, I turned out to be mistaken.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「宮沢様が男らしい、わたくしの理想像であることは変わりませんもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Still, that does not change the fact that he is the very portrait of my ideal man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Still, that does not change the fact that he is the very portrait of my ideal man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに…」
`佐々美@「もしかしたら、好きっていうのは、もっと別なものなんじゃないかって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am starting to think that the feelings I have for him might not actually be love...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am starting to think that the feelings I have for him might not actually be love...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「う、うまく言えませんけど…素敵だとか、かっこいいとかではなく、例えば…ずっと一緒にいてほしいと思うような、ですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I cannot put it into words well... but it is not about being nice or handsome... I think it is more about making you want to be with them forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I cannot put it into words well... but it is not about being nice or handsome... I think it is more about making you want to be with them forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
なんか、笹瀬川さん、すごく前向きだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She managed to sound so positive...
MESSAGE.Translation: She managed to sound so positive...

MESSAGE.JP: あれだけ謙吾にベタ惚れだったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite having been head over heels for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite having been head over heels for him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、すごいね…」
`佐々美@「は？　なにがですの？」
`理樹@「いや、僕だったらこんな状況、へこんで何も出来なそうだなって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I were you, I'd probably be too depressed to do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I were you, I'd probably be too depressed to do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そりゃ、わたくしだって…」
`佐々美@「ふ、深く、傷ついて…」
`佐々美@「う…」
`佐々美@「うわああぁぁーーんっ!!」
`理樹@「うわっ、笹瀬川さんっ」
しまった、やぶへびだった…。
`佐々美@「…落ち着きましたわ」
`理樹@「あ、うん…」
笹瀬川さんの切り替えの速さは美点だと思う…。
MESSAGE.EN: She could switch her mood quickly. I think that was one of her good traits.
MESSAGE.Translation: She could switch her mood quickly. I think that was one of her good traits.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、本当は虚勢を張ってるだけなんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was sure she was just pretending to be alright.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was sure she was just pretending to be alright.

MESSAGE.JP: 明言されたわけじゃなくても、憧れだった人に振られちゃったわけだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though he hadn't said it to her face, she had still been rejected by the person she admired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though he hadn't said it to her face, she had still been rejected by the person she admired.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…そんな顔しないでくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you please not make that face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you please not make that face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ…ご、ごめん」
`佐々美@「何度も言いますけど、謝ってもらってもしょうがないですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I keep telling you this, but apologizing really does not change anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I keep telling you this, but apologizing really does not change anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それならあなたには、いつものように励ましてくださったほうがよっぽどよろしくてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Instead, I would rather you cheered me up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Instead, I would rather you cheered me up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃ、そうだ。
`理樹@「うん、そうだね」
`佐々美@「とりあえず」
`佐々美@「宮沢様までいなくなってしまったわけですわね…」
`理樹@「うん…」
`佐々美@「でしたら、ふたりで出来ることをするだけですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Then we will just have to do what we can do by ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Then we will just have to do what we can do by ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね。また探しに行こう」
結局僕の考えは、見当違いでしかなかったわけで。
MESSAGE.EN: My theory had turned out to be completely wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: My theory had turned out to be completely wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…一個間違えると、どんどん見当違いのほうに行っちゃうんだな）
反省しないといけなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I learned my lesson.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I learned my lesson.

MESSAGE.JP: また、一から考え直しだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to start over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to start over again.

MESSAGE.JP: …だいぶ、近づいてはいると思ってたけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I was sure I was pretty close to the truth...
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I was sure I was pretty close to the truth...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それと、ですわね…」
`佐々美@「わたくしを助けてくれたのがあなただからって、変な期待はしないことですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Please do not have any strange expectations only because you were the one who helped me before!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Please do not have any strange expectations only because you were the one who helped me before!❞

MESSAGE.JP: むんず、とほっぺたをつままれる。
`佐々美@「あなたみたいなちんちくりんで女々しい男に比べたら、宮沢様のほうがよっぽど素敵なんですからねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Miyazawa-sama is far more admirable than a short sissy like you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Miyazawa-sama is far more admirable than a short sissy like you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へ、ひへ？」
`佐々美@「ふんっ」
手を離す。
`理樹@「あ、あれ…」
なんか、僕も振られてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like I got dumped too...
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like I got dumped too...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そういえば」
`理樹@「謙吾に最後、なに言おうとしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you try to tell him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you try to tell him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『ですが』のあと、謙吾は消えてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: He had vanished before she could finish her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had vanished before she could finish her words.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、なんでもないですわよっ」
`理樹@「いや、でもさ」
`佐々美@「何でもいいですわっ、さっさと行きますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is none of your business! Let it go already!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is none of your business! Let it go already!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …行ってしまった。
何なんでしょう。
…人はまばらだった。
こんな状況でも、みんな何一つ疑問には思っていないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed none of them really cared about this bizarre situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed none of them really cared about this bizarre situation.

MESSAGE.JP: …みんな、人形のようだった。
`佐々美@「…戻りましょうか」
`理樹@「え？　でも」
`佐々美@「ひとを気遣っていただけるのはありがたいですけど…」
`佐々美@「今はあなた自身の元気がないことを気遣うべきですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I believe you should be more concerned about your own spirits than mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I believe you should be more concerned about your own spirits than mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなに元気ない？」
`佐々美@「ないですわよ」
`佐々美@「まったく、なんであなたがそんなにへこむのかわかりませんわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For crying out loud, I cannot understand what made you like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For crying out loud, I cannot understand what made you like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩いていく。
`理樹@「いやー…」
…そんなこともないと思うんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really think I'm feeling that down...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really think I'm feeling that down...

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは人間の姿に戻ると、早速エプロンをつけて準備をする。
MESSAGE.EN: Once she turned back into a human, she put on the apron and began to cook.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once she turned back into a human, she put on the apron and began to cook.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さあ、こういうときはおいしいものを食べて元気を取り戻すにかぎりますわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right then, I'll cheer you up by having you eat something delicious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right then, I'll cheer you up by having you eat something delicious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ほら、何でも好きなものを作って差し上げますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You may name anything you want, and I will make it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You may name anything you want, and I will make it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、だったら笹瀬川さんの好きなものを作っていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, then, please cook something you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, then, please cook something you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分僕、笹瀬川さんの作るのなら何でも美味しいと思うし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure anything will be good if you're the one cooking it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure anything will be good if you're the one cooking it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …それに、から元気に見えるんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: And to me, she appeared to be the one in need of cheering up...
MESSAGE.Translation: And to me, she appeared to be the one in need of cheering up...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「も、もちろん、私の好きなもの『も』作りますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝O-Of course I am going to cook what I want, as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝O-Of course I am going to cook what I want, as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、なるほど」
確かに、一種類しか作っちゃいけないってことは無い。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing stopping her from making more than one dish.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing stopping her from making more than one dish.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「洋食でも和食でも、材料があるなら何でも作りますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If we have the necessary ingredients, I can cook up anything you name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If we have the necessary ingredients, I can cook up anything you name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、最初に作ってもらったチンジャオロースーがいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then I'd like that green pepper steak you made before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then I'd like that green pepper steak you made before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、すごくおいしかった」
`佐々美@「あ、あら…」
`佐々美@「じゃ、一皿ですんでしまいますわね…」
`理樹@「あ、笹瀬川さんも好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, so you like it too, Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, so you like it too, Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「べ、べつに…」
`佐々美@「ただ、この間作ったときに一番喜んでましたから、それを作ろうと思っていただけですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I was merely thinking about cooking that since you seemed to have enjoyed it the most...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I was merely thinking about cooking that since you seemed to have enjoyed it the most...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　だって、さっきふたりの好きなものをって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? But didn't you say you were going to make what each of us wanted...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? But didn't you say you were going to make what each of us wanted...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うるさいですわねっ!!　とにかく、ニ皿作りますわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Shut your mouth!! I'm going to make two portions of it, anyway!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Shut your mouth!! I'm going to make two portions of it, anyway!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …結局、笹瀬川さんだって、僕のことを気遣いすぎてるって事なんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she was trying too hard to be considerate of me, just like I was being of her...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she was trying too hard to be considerate of me, just like I was being of her...

MESSAGE.JP: ようし、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded, telling myself it was going to work out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded, telling myself it was going to work out.

MESSAGE.JP: がんばろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to do my best.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to do my best.

MESSAGE.JP: …笹瀬川さんのためだ。
…というわけで、その日はメインの皿がふたつの、大ボリュームな夕食になった。
MESSAGE.EN: As she'd said she would, Sasasegawa-san cooked two portions of the main dish, which made for quite a large supper.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she'd said she would, Sasasegawa-san cooked two portions of the main dish, which made for quite a large supper.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに、それぞれの皿には付け合せもきっちりとついていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She also included a generous amount of sides.
MESSAGE.Translation: She also included a generous amount of sides.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふう…おなかいっぱいだぁ」
`佐々美@「元気でました？」
`理樹@「うん」
`佐々美@「ならよかったですわ」
上機嫌で食器を片付けにいく。
MESSAGE.EN: She began washing the dishes in a bright mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began washing the dishes in a bright mood.

MESSAGE.JP: …きっと、大丈夫じゃないかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Things would probably work themselves out...
MESSAGE.Translation: Things would probably work themselves out...

MESSAGE.JP: なぜだかよくわからないけど、そんな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: That was just some feeling I had.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was just some feeling I had.
